texts.en: Communal group '27 de mayo' (the name means '27th of May') is starting its fifth cycle with field partner Pro Mujer, in the framework of the focus centre of Copacabana. It has eight members and an executive board, with Susana as president. The members of the group are engaged in various activities, among them cattle trading, baby-clothes sewing, api (a popular drink made with sweetcorn and sugar, usually drunk while eating dumplings) sales, catering, and lamb-meat sales. This loan will thus benefit a group of very small entrepreneurs with diverse businesses. Susana tells us that she has been working with Pro Mujer for two years. She got to know this field partner thanks to a spokesperson, who came to visit her at her house. Susana sells api, a trade she learned from her family, who has been in it for thirty years. She decided to start selling the drink on her own. She needs this loan in order to increase her working capital and buy api and cooking oil. She will buy these from wholesale sellers in La Paz and then sell the product in her neighbourhood.The income Susana derives from her business enables her to help with household expenses, since she is married and has four children. When asked what she likes about working with Pro Mujer, she talks about the training received on topics such as health and credit options.

loans.use: to buy cooking oil and api (a traditional drink).

loans.name: Judith

texts.en:
Judith is 30 years old, married, and has two children. To add to her spouse's income, she raises hogs, which she sells after they have achieved the desired weight. She has been in the hog-raising business for almost a year. Now, she is asking for a loan of PHP 5,000 to buy feed and vaccines for sustaining her business.

Judith hopes to keep achieving good sales and to increase her profit in the future, for overall sustenance of her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and vaccines for her hogs

loans.name: Julieta

texts.en:
Julieta is 49 years old, and she operates a small business selling personal products to the people in her village. She earns an income of about PHP 3,000 each month, which she uses for her family's sustenance. She patiently offers her products, and she wants to increase her income -- that is why she is asking for a loan of PHP 5,000 to buy colognes, perfumes, soap, and fabric conditioners to resell. 

She hopes to gain higher profits someday, so she can earn more income for her family and achieve financial stability.

loans.use: to buy colognes, perfumes, soap, and fabric conditioners to resell

loans.name: Jenifer

texts.en:
Jenifer is a fruit and vegetable vendor, who lives at Palao with her spouse and four children. She patiently offers her produce on a house-to-house basis, because she has no stall where she might stack up her produce. She has been in her business for two years, and she earns about PHP 2,000 each month.

Now, Jenifer is asking for a loan of PHP 5,000 to buy bananas, tomatoes, eggplant and cabbages to sell. She hopes this will help increase her sales capacity, and income as well, for the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy more bananas, tomatoes, eggplant, and cabbages to resell from door to door in her area

loans.name: Dilena Del Socorro

texts.es:
Dilena del Socorro de 43 años de edad,  madre soltera con dos hijos menores de edad de 12, 8 años. Originaria del Managua, lugar que está ubicado en la zona de occidente del país. En algunas ocasiones le gusta compartir y cocinar con sus hijos las “güirilas” que es un plato típico de la ciudad; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos no pudo cursar una carrera universitaria, pero le hubiera gustado mucho estudiar la carrera de ciencia de los alimentos. 
Gracias a su espíritu de emprendedor y sus ganas de salir adelante, tiene por actividad económica el servicio de taxi privado y cliente en general, actividad que la desempeña de forma ambulante, y dedica unas 12 horas diarias a  brindar el servicio. Actividad que la desempeña con mucho gusto, ya que ha sido su forma de vida y la de sus hijos. El objetivo del crédito es invertir en capital de trabajo y darle mantenimiento a su unidad de taxi como llantas nuevas, engrasadas, cambios de frenos, válvulas. Para que en un futuro no muy lejano pueda obtener mejores ingresos.  Dilena agradece a los inversionistas kiva la ayuda que les bridan a personas de escasos recursos y países pobre como es Nicaragua para tener  un medio de trabajo digno.
texts.en: Dilena del Socorro is 43 years old, a single mother, who has two children aged twelve and eight. She comes from Managua, in the West of the country. She likes to cook and share with her children a local delicacy, named 'güirilas', which are a type of sweetcorn pancake. Due to her lack of financial resources, she was not able to go to university, but she would have liked to study nutrition. Thanks to her enterprising spirit and her desire to get ahead in life, she has her own business: a taxi service. She drives people around the city some twelve hours per day. She is happy to have this business, as this is what feeds her and her children. She needs the loan to perform maintenance on her taxi by greasing some parts as well as changing what needs to be changed: the tyres, the brakes, and the valve. Her aim is to improve her income in the near future. Dilena thanks Kiva lenders for the help they bring impoverished people in poor countries such as Nicaragua, enabling them to have an honest job.

loans.use: to perform maintenance on her taxi.

loans.name: Cariñosas De Viacha Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “CARIÑOSAS DE VIACHA”  iniciará el primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Juan Pablo II, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Lisbeth es la presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de vajillas, compra y venta de ganado, venta de comida, venta de pollos, tejidos de chompas, artesano, trenzados de manta.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Lisbeth es integrante, ella indica que es el primer ciclo que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación de un promotor de la institución que fue a visitarle a su casa. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de distribución de vajilla (préstamo); da a conocer que este negocio lo emprendió hace un año a enseñanza de su tía.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de vajillas) que adquirirá de las tiendas de la ciudad de La Paz y posteriormente lo distribuirá en su espacio de comercialización. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para mantener en lo posible a su hogar pues ella es soltera y tiene un hijo.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta le gusta los préstamos y el apoyo en salud.
texts.en:
The community association, "Caring Women of Viacha" will begin its first cycle in Pro Mujer (Pro Women), as a part of the Juan Pablo II Center. This group is composed of 8 members and it is directed by a board where Lisbeth is the president. The businesses that the members of the community association are promoting are varied. Among the businesses there are: dinnerware sales, the purchase and sale of livestock, the sale of food, the sale of chickens, woven sweaters, artisan crafts, and braided rugs.  

The loan that the group will receive benefits small microenterprises, of whom Lisbeth is a participant. She notes that this is her first cycle through Pro Mujer which she joined through the invitation of a promoter who came and visited her at her house. Today she has a business distributing dinnerware on loan. She told us that this business began a year ago when she was taught by her aunt. 

The loan that she will receive will increase her capital (through purchasing dinnerware) that she acquires from stores in the city of La Paz and afterwards she will distribute them from her place of business. This work makes it possible for her to generate the resources needed to maintain her home because she is single and has a son. 

When we asked her what she likes about Pro Mujer, she responded that the likes the loans and the healthcare support.

loans.use: to buy dinnerware.

loans.name: Karla Lissette

texts.es: Karla Lissette vive junto a sus  hijos en casa propia,  ella posee una tienda de manualidades, invitaciones, flores, muñecos de fommi, entre otros ya lleva varios años con el negocio y se ha hecho de experiencia muy valiosa que le permite mantener la calidad en su labor, la ubicación de su negocio es muy estratégica, tiene mucha clientela pues las personas saben que todo lo que vende es de calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es excelente; Karla es una mujer  activa siempre está dispuesta a trabajar, quiere alcanzar sus sueños y no descansara hasta lograrlo; su más grande sueño es hacer crecer su negocio  quiere invertir en insumos pero no posee de suficiente capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar fommi, durapax, listón, papel, silicón etc. Karla Lissette es muy responsable y tiene buenas referencias de pago, esta contenta con el apoyo y asegura que pagara el financiamiento, a la vez confía en que su familia tendrá una mejor vida.
texts.en:
Karla Lissette lives together with her children in her own house. She has a store of crafts, invitations, flowers and dolls of fommi, among other things. She has had her business for several years and and it is her valuable experience that permits her to maintain the quality of her work. The location of her business is very strategic. She has many customers because people know that everything she sells is of good quality and at affordable prices, and in addition the service is excellent.

Karla is an active woman always ready to work. She wants to achieve her dreams and will not tire until she succeeds. Her biggest dream is to grow her business. She wants to invest in supplies but does not have sufficient capital and therefore is requesting from INTEGRAL a loan which will permit her to buy foam board, styrofoam, ribbon, paper, silicone glue, etc.

Karla Lissette is very responsible and has good payment references. She is happy with the support and promises to pay the financing, while trusting that her family will have a better life.

loans.use: to buy foam board, styrofoam, ribbon, paper, silicone glue, etc.

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn lives at Palao. She is 32 years old and married to Pedro, and they have two children. To generate income, she raises hogs, to resell them for profits. She had been in her business for over a year and earns about PHP 2,000 per hog sale.

Evelyn hopes to continue providing good care to the hogs, and that is why she is asking for a loan of PHP 5,000. She will use the loan to buy medicines and hog feed. It will help her to achieve good profits in the business. Her future plan is to keep growing as a successful hog-raiser.

loans.use: to buy medicines and hog feed for her hog-raising business

loans.name: Jose Eduardo

texts.es: José de 43 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos, ella se dedica a la venta de dulces típicos de forma ambulante, mientras José se dedica a atender la tienda que poseen en su casa de habitación en la cual su esposa también le ayuda cuando no sale a vender. José desea mucho el poder mejorar las condiciones de su tienda, surtiéndola de productos enlatados, pan, golosinas, leche, sodas, jugos, detergentes, y todos los productos necesarios para atender a más clientes. José desea que su negocio crezca de manera que sus ganancias se vean incrementadas.
texts.en: José is 43 years old and lives with his spouse and their children. She is an ambulant vendor of typical sweets, while José tends to the shop they own at their home. His wife also helps with the shop on the days when she does not go out. José's greatest wish is to improve his shop: he wants to sell tinned foods, bread, sweets, milk, fizzy drinks, fruit juice, cleaning products, and other products, in order to have more customers. He wants to see his business grow in order to increase his income.

loans.use: to buy products to sell at his shop.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase more stock such as crates of milk, loaves of bread, sugar, margarine, cooking fat, bales of wheat, and maize flour

loans.name: Ana Del Carmen

texts.es: Ana, es muy conocida en la zona por ser responsable y trabajadora, ella vive junto a su esposo e hijos. Ana se encarga de comercializar productos de belleza como: cosméticos, cremas, perfumes, champú y otros más. Ana vende sus productos de forma ambulante, y cuenta con varios clientes fijos que la refieren con otras personas que también le compran sus productos. Ella es una mujer muy alegre que siempre está en busca de mejoras continua por lo que solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda invertir en la compra de más cosméticos y cremas y así de este modo mejorar sus ganancias
texts.en: Ana enjoys a good reputation in her neighbourhood as a responsible and hard-working woman. She lives with her husband and children. Ana sells beauty products such as cosmetics, moisturisers, perfume, shampoo, and others. She sells them door to door, and has many loyal customers, who often refer other customers to her. Ana is a very cheerful person, always looking to improve her business. This is why she asks field partner Integral for a loan, in order to buy more cosmetics and moisturisers to sell and improve her income.

loans.use: to buy beauty products to sell.

loans.name: Nora Elizabeth

texts.es: Nora de 33 años de edad, vive junto a sus hijos en casa propia. Ella es una señora muy responsable y trabajadora  la  cual cuenta con muy bueno valores, razón por la que es muy respetada y querida. Nora posee  una tienda de productos perecederos y de primera necesidad, la cual le permite suplir a sus hijos con muchos esfuerzos de todo lo necesario. Nora solicita un préstamo a través del cual le pueda surtir la tienda con todos los productos necesarios para mejorar su negocio, y no tener ningún tipo de competencias, con lo que pueda ser la primera opción para las personas. Con esto Nora podrá mejorar sus ventas y darles una vida mejor a sus hijos quienes dependen por completo de ella.
texts.en: Nora is 33 years old and she lives together with her children in her own home. She is a very responsible woman and a hard worker who has good values, which is why she is very respected and loved. Nora has a store of perishable products and other primary necessities. Through a lot of effort, the store allows her to supply her children with all that they need. Nora is seeking a loan through which she wil be able to stock the store with all of the primary products needed to improve her business. She does not have any competitors, which means she is the first option for her customers. With this loan Nora will be able to increase her sales and to give a better life to her children who are completely dependent on her.

loans.use: to buy the primary products needed to stock her store.

loans.name: Raúl Antonio

texts.es: Raúl de 43 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa y un hijo que se dedica a estudiar. Raúl posee un molino el cual está ubicado en su casa de habitación, en donde las personas llegan a moler: maíz, frijoles, verduras y diferentes tipos de alimentos ya sea para elaborar algún tipo de masa o para hacer salsas.  Así mismo cuenta con una venta de leña y café molido, lo cual vende con vecinos y personas de la zona. Raúl  solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda contar con el dinero necesario para comprar un molino más y de esta forma atender a más personas, así mismo para comprar leña por mayor y comprar más café para moler y posteriormente comercializa. Él desea mucho mejorar su negocio, debido a que es la única fuente de ingresos que posee para vivir de una forma digna y sostener a su familia.
texts.en: Raúl is 43 years old. He lives with his wife and one son, who is a student. He owns a grinder in his home which he rents so that people can grind different types of food such as sweetcorn, broad beans, vegetables, and other types of aliments, to make some kind of either dough or sauce. He also sells firewood and ground coffee to neighbours and people in the area. Raúl asks for a loan to buy one more grinder in order to serve more customers, and to buy more firewood wholesale for retail and more coffee to grind and sell. His greatest wish is to improve his business, since it is his only source of income with which to live with dignity and support his family.

loans.use: to buy coffee and firewood to sell.

loans.name: Carlos Manuel

texts.es: Carlos vive junto a su esposa quien trabaja vendiendo dulces, y así mismo vive junto a un hijo de once años de edad. Carlos trabaja vendiendo productos varios como: dulces, juguetes, lámparas, pegamentos, guitarras para niños, pelotas y otros más. Su negocio se encuentra sobre calle principal, lo que le ayuda mucho a que las personas le compren, ya que está a la vista de todos los adultos y niños que transitan por la zona. Él con mucha ilusión de mejorar su negocio y aumentar sus ventas, solicita un préstamo para poder comprar mayor cantidad de juguetes, dulces, sorpresitas para niños entre otros artículos más y de esta manera mejorar su negocio.
texts.en: Carlos lives with his wife, who works as a sweets seller. They have a son, who is eleven. Carlos sells various products such as sweets, toys, lamps, glue, children's guitars, balls, and other items. His business is located on the main street, a fact that helps him have many customers, since his wares are in full view of passersby, adults and children alike. Carlos's dearest wish is to improve his business and his sales. This is why he asks for a loan with which to buy more toys, sweets, gifts, and other items to sell.

loans.use: to buy sweets, toys, and other products to sell.

loans.name: Gloria Margarita

texts.es: Gloria es una mujer muy trabajadora quien lucha a diario por tener una vida digna y contar con todo lo necesario para salir adelante. Ella posee una tienda de productos de primera necesidad en su casa tales como: café instantáneo, pan, leche, huevos, queso, bebidas y otros más. Gloria es una persona muy responsable y amable razón por la cual cuenta con varios clientes fijos.  El mayor deseo de Gloria es poder mejorar grandemente, surtiendo la tienda con más productos de primera necesidad como: granos básicos, verduras, frutas entre otros más, todo lo que le permita mejorar el negocio y percibir mayores ganancias para contar con una mejor vida. Es por esta razón que solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, y de este modo poder lograr lo anteriormente mencionado.
texts.en: Gloria is a very hard-working woman, who fights day to day in order to live with dignity and have all she needs to improve her lot in life. She owns a shop where she sells first-necessity items, such as instant coffee, bread, milk, eggs, cheese, drinks, etc. A nice and responsible person, she has many loyal customers. Her greatest wish is to greatly improve her business by adding more products to her inventory: basic grains, vegetables, fruits, anything that will enable her to improve her shop and increase her income in order to have a better quality of life. Those are the reasons for which she asks field partner Integral for a loan.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, vegetables, and fruits to sell.

loans.name: Sandra Yanira

texts.es: Sandra vive junto a su esposo y sus hijos, Sandra trabaja en su propio negocio en el que vende verduras y frutas, su puesto está ubicado en un mercado cercano al lugar que ella reside, el cual poco a poco ha ido surtiendo gracias a la ayuda que INTEGRAL le ha brindado. Aún falta mucho por crecer, es por esto que Sandra solicita un préstamo para poder comprar mayor cantidad de frutas como: jocotes, mangos, melones, sandía, también comprar más verduras como ejotes, lorocos y otros más. Con mucho entusiasmo Sandra tiene la certeza que seguirá mejorando, con lo que podrá alcanzar una mejor estabilidad en su  hogar.
texts.en: Sandra lives with her husband and their children. She owns a fruit and vegetable stall in a market near where she lives. Thanks to field partner Integral's help, she has been adding more and more products to her stock. But there is still much left to do, so she is asking for a loan in order to buy more fruits such as hog plums, mangoes, melons, and watermelons, and more vegetables such as broad beans, lorocos (a kind of edible vine), and others. Sandra is full of enthusiasm, and does not doubt that she will be able to keep improving and have more financial stability in her household.

loans.use: to buy fruits of the season to sell.

loans.name: Melvin Alexander

texts.es: Melvin de 26 años de edad, vive junto a su madre, su esposa y tres hijos que se dedican a estudiar. Melvin trabaja como comerciante de productos varios como: peluches, globos, pequeños regalos, dulces y otros más, su venta se ve muy influenciada dependiendo de la temporada que sea.  Melvin desea mejorar sus ventas e incrementar sus ganancias, es por esto que solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, para poder invertir en la compra de productos varios para vender como: peluches, tazas, dulces, tarjetas y otros más, los cuales le permitan ver un crecimiento en su negocio y en su economía familiar.
texts.en:
Melvin is 26 years old and lives with his mother and his wife, and 3 children. All his children are in school. Melvin sells a variety of products, including felt items, balloons, small gifts, sweets, and other things. His sales are very much influenced by the season.  

Melvin wishes to improve his sales and increase his earnings. That's why he is requesting a loan through INTEGRAL, so that he can invest in the purchase of various products to sell, like felt items, cups, sweets, cards, and other items, allowing him to continue expanding his business and his family economy.

loans.use: to buy sweets, felt objects, cups, and more, to improve his business.

loans.name: Shoghik

texts.en:
Shoghik, from the village of Mrgavan in the Ararat region, lives with her husband, mother-in-law and three children. She and her husband own land upon which they cultivate tomatoes, peaches, apricots and apple trees. Involved in agriculture for seven years, it has already become a part of their life. Their son helps them to take the harvest to the market and sell it to the local market traders.

Shoghik owns an old greenhouse which needs to be renovated, so she is requesting this loan to purchase a polyethylene cover for it and to cover cultivation costs. The renovated greenhouse will enable her to cultivate a variety of of fruits and vegetables.

The loan is very important for Shoghik to earn higher income and make her family's life better.

loans.use: to purchase a polyethylene cover for the greenhouse and cover cultivation costs.

loans.name: Moses

texts.en:
Moses, age 45, is a cattle farmer. He makes a living by buying young heifers and selling them after they have been fattened. His primary challenge is that of cattle diseases, since once the cattle catch a disease, the area is sometimes quarantined, leading to a period of no sales.

He and his wife have three children between the ages of 18 and 23. He loves his family and longs to be able to provide them with all that they need.

He is currently requesting a loan in order to pay university fees for his eldest child.

loans.use: to pay university fees for his eldest child

loans.name: Rosalinda

texts.en: Rosalinda is 58 years old and married with five grown-up children. Her spouse is a farmer, and Rosalinda generates income by selling fruits and vegetables in their village. She has been in the business for over a year, and she aims to further improve her proceeds. She is asking for a loan of PHP 5,000 to buy cabbages, eggplant, and tomatoes to sell. This will help improve her sales capacity and gain enough income to provide for the family's daily consumption.

loans.use: to buy cabbages, eggplant, and tomatoes to sell

loans.name: Maria

texts.en:
Maria, age 54, raises pigs to earn an income. She has been engaged in this business for 10 years. To generate additional income, she also has a basket-weaving business. She makes and sells baskets made of buri, a native variety of palm.

Maria and her husband have raised four children, now grown, and live in Corella, Bohol.

Maria has requested a loan in the amount of PhP 10,000 in order to buy feed for her pigs and materials for basket-weaving. 

In the future, Maria would like to invest in other business ventures so that she can have a sustainable livelihood.

loans.use: to buy feed for her pigs and materials for basket-weaving

loans.name: Marjorie

texts.en:
Marjorie is a farmer living in San Miguel, Bohol. She is a married woman and has been engaged in rice farming for more than three years now.

Marjorie works very hard in order to help her husband in meeting their needs, especially for their children.

Marjorie is asking for a loan to buy fertilizer and pesticides and to pay the school expenses of her children. With this, she will be able to improve the growth and productivity of their rice field.

In the future, Marjorie hopes to make her business a success and productive. She dreams of experiencing the fullness of life together with her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pesticides and to pay the school expenses of her children.

loans.name: Marcos

texts.en:
Marcos is a married man of 45 from San Miguel, Bohol. He has three children. The eldest is 18 and the youngest is 11 years old. Marcos has been farming for 15 years, raising rice. He earns 4000 PHP in a month. This is the primary source of his income.

Marcos is requesting a loan to buy fertilizer. He will also use the loan to pay for family needs. With this loan, he can acquire everything he needs and support the growth of his business. In the future, Marcos hopes to expand his business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pay for other family needs

loans.name: Amelia

texts.en:
Amelia is 52 years old, and she is still strong enough to be involved in the business of selling vegetables to the people in her village. She offers her merchandise door-to-door and earns about PHP 3,000 each month selling fruits and vegetables. She uses her income for school fees and to provide for her family's daily consumption. Amelia aims to increase her income, so she is asking for a loan of PHP 5,000 to buy more tomatoes and cabbages to sell. 

Someday, Amelia would like to achieve economic stability and keep improving services to all of her customers.

loans.use: to buy more tomatoes and cabbages to sell

loans.name: Mary

texts.en: Mary sells peppers and spices in Elmina. She has been educated through the secondary school level. She is married and has 4 children. Her husband is a preacher in their community. Mary has been selling peppers and spices in the market for some time now. She is responsible for helping to support her husband with the family's general expenses. Her loan will be used to buy an increased quantity and variety of vegetables and spices to sell in the market. Mary hopes to use the new profits from her business to to expand her food-selling trade.

loans.use: to buy an increased quantity and variety of vegetables and spices to sell in the market.

loans.name: Nino

texts.en:
Nino is 53 years old. She is married and lives in the small town of Tkibuli, with her spouse and two grandchildren (14 and 26 years old) who go to the local school. Nino’s husband works as a miner and gets a small monthly salary. The main income for the family is money transfers from abroad, which are sent by Nino’s son and daughter-in-law. Nino used to have a grocery store, but her project was stopped because of financial problems.

Nino requested a loan for restarting her grocery store business. Nino’s loan request was approved, as part of the new joint initiative of Kiva and Credo. The start-up loan program provides credit for business start-ups and restart-ups, with soft conditions, to rural poor people who do not have access to credit products, being regarded as “high-risk borrowers” because of their low income. With the received credit, Nino will cover the cost of purchasing a stock of basic groceries and restarting the grocery store. She hopes her project will be profitable, because she has enough experience in this field. Nino plans to increase the turnover in her grocery business, gradually.

The new business initiative, financed with the Kiva start-up loan, will significantly increase the income of the family. Nino will work hard, and she will be able to improve the living conditions for her family. With this loan, her family will generate enough income to access credit products that are regularly available in the country’s capital market, in the event that they need to in the future.

loans.use: to purchase a stock of groceries and restart-up the grocery store business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy sugar, rice and soft drinks to sell

loans.name: Prima

texts.en:
Prima, age 58, and her husband are engaged in a farming business. This has been her business for the past 30 years and is her sole source of income for supporting the family. She and her husband have one child and live in San Miguel, Bohol. 

Prima is requesting a loan in order to buy fertilizer, medicine, and sprayer. These will be used to make her business healthy and productive. 

In the future, Prima hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, medicine, and sprayer

loans.name: Amina

texts.en: Amina is a 33-year-old woman with 3 children living in Fort Portal, Uganda. She has a business of selling fresh fruits. Her main challenge is having a lack of preservation equipment, thus leading to losses. Her dream is to buy a refrigerator and expand her business. A good mother that she is, she desires to educate her children up to a university level. Amina intends to use the loan to buy fresh foods like oranges, watermelons, passion fruits and beans to sell.

loans.use: To buy fresh foods like oranges, watermelons, passion fruits and beans to sell

loans.name: Raquel

texts.en: Raquel is a 38-year-old married woman and the mother of seven children. She is from San Miguel, Bohol. Together with her husband, Raquel has been engaged in rice farming for more than 20 years. She is asking for a loan to buy additional fertilizer and pesticides. Raquel believes that this loan could help her improve her business and make it even more sustainable.

loans.use: to buy additional fertilizer and pesticides

loans.name: Deysi Carolina

texts.es: Deysi de 26 años de edad, es una joven emprendedoras con grandes deseos de salir adelante y contar con todo lo necesario para vivir de una forma digna. Ella se dedica a la venta de perfumes y productos que se venden por catálogo como: cosméticos, joyería, artículos para la cocina y el hogar, y otros más. Para poder contar con varios clientes Deysi realiza visitas de casa en casa para presentar sus productos, los cuales en su mayoría vende a crédito, por lo que necesita contar con capital para invertir en más compras y entregar todos los pedidos. Deysi solicita un préstamo  a INTEGRAL, con el cual pueda adquirir más productos para mejorar sus ventas y así hacer crecer su negocio.
texts.en:
Deysi is 26 years old and is an enterprising young woman with big dreams to get ahead and to achieve everything necessary to live a dignified life. She makes a living selling perfumes and products that are sold through a catalog such as: cosmetics, jewelry, items for the kitchen and the home, and others.

In order to get clients, Deysi does visits from house to house in order to present her products, the majority of which she sells on credit, which is the reason why she needs capital to invest in more purchases to deliver all of her orders. Deysi is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL, with which she will be able to acquire more products to improve her sales and thereby grow her business.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics and perfumes to sell

loans.name: Stephen

texts.en:
Stephen used the previous loan to buy general merchandise. He is a hardworking man living in Fort Portal, Uganda. 

For ten years now, Stephen has been running a retail shop and with the proceeds he has been able to buy land. His main challenges are fluctuating prices and inflation. His dream is to someday own a car and a wholesale business.

Stephen is requesting a loan to buy salt and sugar to sell.

loans.use: to buy salt and sugar to sell.

loans.name: Anne

texts.en:
Anne is now 40 years old; she is still married and mother to four children. She still runs her restaurant business, which has improved, and her monthly income is KES 6,500.  

She is now taking her second loan from KADET LTD, in the amount of KES 34,000. She wishes to use this amount to pay school fees for her children, and to buy sugar and teaspoons for use in the business.  

The profits she earns from using the loan in her business will be used to purchase a fridge for her restaurant. Her dream is to educate her children to greater levels.

loans.use: To pay school fees for her children, and to buy sugar and teaspoons for use in her restaurant business

loans.name: Francis

texts.en:
Francis is requesting his second loan from KADET Ltd after having successfully repaid his first one. He benefited greatly from his first loan by expanding his grocery business and increasing his earnings.

Francis intends to use his loan funds to purchase 20 bags of potatoes to offer for sale.

He hopes to further expand his business in the near future. His goal is to improve his family's living standards.

loans.use: to purchase 20 bags of potatoes to offer for sale

loans.name: Ma.gigi

texts.en:
Ma. Gigi is a 42-year-old married woman from Baclayon, Bohol. She has a 15-year-old son.

Ma. Gigi operates a variety store in her community. She sells various items such as shampoo, condiments, soft drinks and beverages. She has been operating a variety store business for eight years. 

She requested a loan of 16,000 PHP to buy more groceries to sell like rice, soaps, sugar and cooking oil. 

In the future, Ma. Gigi would like to expand her business to support the education of her son and to improve their status of living.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell like rice, soaps, sugar and cooking oil.

loans.name: Fatima Lucia

texts.es: La señora Fatima, habita en el municipio de Ticuantepe junto a su esposo e hijos, con mucho esfuerzo a hido construyendo su casa poco a poco ya que su mayor sueño es verla terminada con este nuevo financiamiento comprara Materiales como Cemento, Arena, Bloques, Reglas, Clavos, Piedrin etc. Agradece a Afodenic la confianza brindada al igual a Fondos Kiva por el apoyo.
texts.en: Fatima lives in the town of Ticuantepe with her husband and their children. She has been building her house little by little and with great efforts, and her biggest dream is to see it finished. The new loan she is requesting will be used to buy construction materials such as cement, sand, blocks, screeds, nails and piedrín (a type of building stone). She is grateful to Afodenic for trusting in her and to Kiva for its support.

loans.use: To buy cement, sand, blocks, screeds, nails and piedrín.

loans.name: Josselyn  Steffany

texts.es: Josselyn de 20 años de edad, vive junto a su madre y una hermana. Josselyn es una persona que desde muy joven ha tenido que trabajar para poder ayudarle a tu madre con los gastos del hogar, ella trabaja en su propia sala de belleza en la que se encarga de realizar cortes de cabellos, tintes, faciales y otros servicios más, así mismo comercializa cosméticos, ganchos para el cabello y otros. Con esto ella le brinda una gran ayuda a su familia, es por esta razón que solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, con el cual pueda comprar tijeras, máquina para cortar cabello, productos de belleza y todo lo necesario para realizar más trabajos, lo cual será de mucho beneficio para ella ya que podrá mejorar sus ganancias.
texts.en:
Josselyn, 20 years old, lives together with her mother and her sister. Josselyn is a person who has had to work since she was very young in order to help her mother with the household expenses. 

She works in her own beauty salon where she is responsible for providing haircuts, coloring services, facials, and other services. This work is a great help to her family, and for this reason she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL, with which she will be able to buy scissors, a machine to cut hair, beauty products and all that is necessary to carry out her work, which will be of much benefit for her since she will be able to improve her earnings.

loans.use: to buy products for a beauty salon

loans.name: Ana Olga

texts.es: Ana Olga vive junto a sus tres hijos en casa propia, ella se dedica a la venta de pupusas en el lugar de su residencia, tiene varios años de trabajar con el pequeño negocio y ha adquirido experiencia valiosa que le permite agilizar la producción, gracias al buen manejo de la venta siempre obtiene las mejores ganancias, la comunidad donde vive es muy transitada y ya tiene mucha clientela, aunque sus mejores clientes son los vecinos, todos la prefieren porque su producto es de calidad, a un precio accesible y sobre todo con el servicio mas rápido del lugar; Ana es una mujer activa, decidida y muy dedicada a su labor, desea salir adelante y cumplir sus sueños por eso todos los días se esfuerza al máximo en el trabajo pues sabe que solo así alcanzara el éxito que tanto espera, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda y quiere aprovechar para una nueva inversión, pero no posee de suficiente capital que la respalde por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor, chicharrón, quesillo, leña, etc. Ana Olga tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá cancelar la deuda y a la vez tiene fe que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Ana Olga lives with her three children in their own home. She works selling pupusas (stuffed tortilla, a traditional dish of El Salvador) in her place of residence. She has worked in this small business for a few years and she has acquired valuable experience which allows her to speed up the production. Thanks to her good management of sales she always obtains the best profits. The community where she lives is very busy, so she has many customers. Although her best customers are her neighbours, they all prefer her because her product is high quality, at an accessible price, and above all has the fastest service in the area. 

Ana is an active woman, and very dedicated to her work. She wants to get ahead and to achieve her dreams, so every day she puts the maximum effort into her work, as she knows that only then will she achieve the success she hopes for so much. In the last few weeks demand has increased, and she wishes to make the most of this for a new investment, but she does not have sufficient capital to support this. For this reason she is applying to INTEGRAL for a loan which will allow her to buy corn wholesale, and shredded pork, soft cheese, firewood etc. Ana Olga has good payment references and is very responsible, she guarantees that she will be able to repay the debt, and at the same time she has faith that she will bring financial security to her home.

loans.use: to buy corn wholesale, and shredded pork, soft cheese, and firewood.

loans.name: Classic Group

texts.en:
Samwel, who is in his early 30s, is married and has one child who is still young.  Samwel has been running a genge-duka, selling fruits, vegetables, sugar, beans, salt, flour and the like, in the same shop, for two years now. He works from 7.00 a.m. to 8.30 p.m. daily and is able to make a fair monthly profit.  

This will be Samwel's second loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  He used the previous loan to buy fruits, vegetables and drinks, like soda, water and juice, and he has paid back his loan successfully.  He will use this new loan to buy a water container and to buy items his store is now lacking, like beans, wheat flour, mangoes and pineapples. He dreams of owning a wholesale shop.

Samwel will share this loan with his loan group, Classic, which is comprised of 10 members, including Samwel. They will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy a water container and to buy items his store is now lacking, like beans, wheat flour, mangoes and pineapple.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph has been practicing farming for the past six and a half years. He currently earns a monthly income of KES 12,000. 

He has received a previous loan, which he is consistently repaying, and has now applied for another loan, which he will use to start a poultry keeping business. He will also buy seedlings and fertilizer for his farm.
   
With the expected profits generated by this investment, he intends to venture into large-scale poultry farming. 
 
His hopes and dreams are to have an established business as a farmer.

loans.use: to buy seedlings and fertilizer for his farm and also start poultry keeping  business

loans.name: Rosita

texts.en:
Rosita earns a living through her food vending business, selling home-cooked snack foods to the people in her place. She has been in the business for more than ten years now. 

Rosita is applying for a loan to buy additional ingredients like flour, sugar, butter, milk and other ingredients. With this, she will be able to cook and sell more. 

In the future, Rosita hopes of making her business a success.

loans.use: to buy additional ingredients like flour, sugar, butter, milk and other ingredients.

loans.name: Diana

texts.es: Hola desde   Perú, Diana de 21 años de edad, una  joven universitaria  con muchos deseos de superación y con ganas de salir adelante, diana estudia  contabilidad  en la universidad ya que es una profesión que le gusta mucho y que la ayudara a  alcanzar sus metas en la vida. Diana tiene la seguridad  de culminar sus estudios con éxitos y poder ser una buena contadora. Con el préstamo otorgado lo invertirá  para el pago de sus pensiones universitarias  y  realizar la compra  de útiles de estudio. Diana   se encuentra muy agradecida con Kiva y Edaprospo  por la ayuda brindada y se despide con la seguridad   de culminar sus metas propuestas.
texts.en:
Hello from Peru. 21-year-old Diana is a young university student with much desire to overcome and get ahead. Diana studies accounting at the university since it is a profession that she likes very much and since it will help her to achieve her goals in life. Diana is sure of completing her studies successfully and becoming a good accountant. 

With the granted loan she will invest in the payment of her university housing and carry out the purchase of academic materials. Diana is very grateful to Kiva and Edaprospo for the help provided and she takes her leave with the security to complete her proposed goals.

loans.use: to pay for her university housing

loans.name: Reginalda

texts.en:
Reginalda, age 39, is a rice farmer. She has been engaged in this business for 15 years and it is the sole source of her income. She and her husband have six children: the youngest is eight years old and the eldest is 19. The family lives in San Miguel, Bohol.
 
Reginalda is requesting a loan in order to buy fertilizer and insecticide. These will be used to help her rice plants grow quickly, maintain their good health, and protect them from insects. With the help of this loan, she can ensure that her business is as productive as possible.
 
In the future, Reginalda hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and insecticide

loans.name: Samuel

texts.en:
Samuel is a 44-year-old farmer from San Miguel, Bohol. He has been engaged in rice farming for more than 5 years now.

Samuel is asking for a loan to buy additional fertilizer and pesticides for his farm. With this, he will be able to improve the productivity of his field.

In the future, Samuel hopes to make his business a success.

loans.use: to buy additional fertilizer and pesticides for his farm.

loans.name: Abigail

texts.en:
Abigail is a married woman and a mother of two young children from Bien Unido, Bohol. Abigail has been engaged in a fishing business together with her husband for more than four years now. This is the source of their income.

Abigail is asking for a loan to buy fuel for the boat. With this, her husband will be able to enhance his catch, thus giving them more fish to sell in the market. In the future, Abigail dreams of making their business sustainable.

loans.use: to buy fuel for the boat.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy more medicines and to open another pharmacy.

loans.name: Evenor Antonio

texts.es: El señor Evenor habitante del municipio de Ticuantepe en el populoso Reparto Juan Ramon Padilla junto a su esposa e hijos, el es conductor para una empresa privada y su esposa se dedica a las tareas del hogar, su mayor sueño es terminar su casa y mejorar de condiciones, con este credito que Afidenic y fondos Kiva le han otorgado comprar Materiales de Construccion como cemento, Ceramica, Bondex, puertas etc. Agradece la Confianza que se le esta brindando con este credito
texts.en: Evenor lives in the populous Juan Ramon Padilla suburb of the town of Ticuantepe with his wife and their children. He is a driver and he works for a private company and his wife is a housewife. His biggest dream is to finish building his house and to improve his living conditions. The loan he has been granted by Afodenic and Kiva will be used to buy construction materials such as cement, ceramic tiles, Bondex varnish and doors. He is grateful for having been trusted with the granting of this loan.

loans.use: To buy cement, ceramic tiles, Bondex varnish and doors.

loans.name: Los Perseverantes Group

texts.es:
Un grupo de vecinos y amigos formaron el banco comunal “Los Perseverantes” del distrito de Cusco de la provincia de Cusco del departamento del Cusco. Este banco comunal está conformado por varias personas que buscan a cada momento las oportunidades para salir adelante y con su esfuerzo diario entregar un mejor futuro a sus hijos. 

Celia nació en la ciudad del Cusco y tiene 54 años de edad y es madre y padre para sus 6 hijos, ella es una persona responsable se  dedica a la venta de productos de primera necesidad como por ejemplo arroz, azúcar, l eche, aceite y otras cosas más, ella trabaja desde las 5:00 a.m. hasta las 10:00 p.m. o hasta que se termine el pan del día, ella ya tiene 3 años en este negocio y  le va muy bien,  además ella tiene un pequeño restaurant donde prepara desayunos, almuerzos y cenas, ella en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo sacos de arroz, sacos de azúcar, cajas de leche y bidones de aceites.

Los demás socios se dedican al negocio de; elaboración de chompas, venta de verduras, venta de cosméticos y otros ofrecen servicios profesionales. Los socios en general agradecen la oportunidad brindada y se comprometen a cumplir con el pago de sus diferentes cuotas en los plazos establecidos. (Las personas que aparecen en la parte inferior de la fotografía llegaron tarde a la reunión).
texts.en:
A group of neighbors and friends for the community bank "Los Perseverantes" (The Persistent), from the Cusco district in the province of Cusco, in the department of Cusco. This community bank is formed of various people that are looking at every moment for opportunities to get ahead, and with their daily effort create a better future for their children.

Celia was born in the city of Cusco and is 54 years old. She is mother and father to her six children. She is a responsible person who works selling basic necessities such as rice, sugar, milk, oil, and other things. She works from 5:00 am until 10:00 pm or until the bread of the day runs out. She has worked in this business for three years and is doing very well. She also has a small restaurant where she makes breakfasts, lunches, and dinners. For this opportunity, she requires a loan in order to purchase merchandise, such as sacks of rice, sugar, boxes of milk, and drums of oil.

The other members work in the following ways: making sweaters, selling vegetables, selling cosmetics and others offer professional services. The members are thankful for the opportunity, and promise to pay their different payments per the established schedule. (The people who appear in the bottom part of the picture arrived late to the meeting).

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as rice, sugar, milk, and oil.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita, age 31, makes and sells calamay to earn a living. Calamay is a sticky, sweet delicacy made of coconut milk, brown sugar, and ground glutinous rice. She has been making and offering calamay for sale for 10 years.

Teresita and her husband have a 10-year-old son and live in Albur, Bohol. 

She has requested a loan in the amount of PhP 12,000 PHP in order to buy ingredients for making calamay, such as glutinous rice, brown sugar, and coconut shells. 

In the future, Teresita would like to invest in other business ventures in order to improve their standard of living, as well as to be able to send her child to school.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for making calamay, such as glutinous rice, brown sugar, and coconut shells

loans.name: Feledian

texts.en:
Felediana is a single mother who lost her husband during their early stage of marriage. She was left with four children, all whom she takes care of singlehandedly, from school fees to home-care needs. 

Having realized the challenges ahead of her as a single mother, she decided to supplement her teaching job with agriculture. Feledian decided to specialize in cattle fattening, an activity which has given her a big step towards achieving her dream of having many cattle, which will enable her to pay her children’s school fees when they reach higher classes. 

Feledian has applied for a loan of 1,000,000 Ugandan shillings to top up her savings from cattle sales to stock more cattle on her farm.

loans.use: To buy cattle.

loans.name: Samir

texts.en:
Samir, age 51, runs a clothing shop to earn an income. He is married and has operated his business since 2002.

Samir has requested a loan from Ryada in order to buy clothing to offer for sale as well as to install shelves in his shop.
 
He is confident that this loan will help him increase his sales and thus improve his income.

loans.use: to buy clothing to offer for sale as well as to install shelves in his shop

loans.name: Michelle

texts.en:
Michelle is a 20-year-old married woman from Panglao, Bohol. She has a 5-year-old son. She raises pigs. She has been in the hog-raising business for five years.  

Michelle has requested a loan of 6,000 PHP to buy feed, additional pigs and food supplements in order for the pigs to grow healthy and so she can sell in a timely manner. In the future, Michelle would like to invest to other business to improve her family's standard of living  and to save for her child's education.

loans.use: to buy feed, additional pigs and food supplements

loans.name: Ana Del Carmen

texts.es: Ana de 52 años de edad, vive en casa propia en compañía de su esposo y un hijo, ella es muy trabajadora quien desde hace muchos años se dedica a la elaboración de faldas y blusas para posteriormente comercializarlas, su esposo le ayuda a vender las prendas de vestir de forma ambulante, con lo que pueden agilizar la venta de la ropa. Ana solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL,  por medio del cual pueda invertir en la compra de diferentes tipos de telas, con distintos estampados y colores, así mismo para comprar hilos, botones y agujas. Con esto Ana podrá aumentar su producción de ropa y así vender más junto a su esposo.
texts.en: Ana is 52 years old, lives in her own house with her spouse and one son. She is a very hard worker who has many years of experience creating skirts and blouses to later sell them. Her spouse helps her sell the inventory by going door-to-door, so that she is able to speed up the sale of clothing. Ana is asking for a loan from INTEGRAL, by which she will invest in the purchase of different types of fabric, with different patterns and colors, and she will also be able to buy thread, buttons, and needles. With this, Ana will be able to increase her production of clothing and therefore sell more with her spouse.

loans.use: To purchase fabric, thread, and buttons to make clothing to sell.

loans.name: Alejandra

texts.en:
Alejandra, age 47, earns an income by selling cosmetic products at retail to people in her neighborhood. She and her husband have four children and live in San Miguel, Bohol.
 
Alejandra is requesting a loan in order to buy more cosmetics to offer for sale, such as makeup, deodorant, and perfume. With this investment, she will be able to improve her sales and profit. 

In the future, Alejandra intends to make her business as successful and sustainable as she can.

loans.use: to buy more cosmetics to offer for sale, such as makeup, deodorant, and perfume

loans.name: Sulkhan

texts.en:
Sulkhan, age 53, is a farmer. He lives in a village in the Tskaltubo district with his wife, 20-year-old daughter and a mother who is provided with a retirement pension. Sulkhan keeps busy running the family's small-scale agricultural business. He owns a vineyard and produces wine with the harvested grapes. Also, he runs a dairy farm with four milk cows, whose milk is used in cheese products. The cheese is sold at the local open market. 

Sulkhan has requested credit for the purpose of building a greenhouse. The new business will be an additional source of income for the family, which will allow them to combat the poverty in which they live. 

Sulkhan’s loan request was approved within the framework of a new joint initiative between Kiva and Credo. This start-up loan program offers business start-up capital and re-startup credit with generous lending conditions to the country's rural poor, who often do not have access to credit, as they are regarded as “high-risk borrowers” because of their low income. 

With the received credit, Sulkhan will purchase materials for the greenhouse construction (iron pillars and polyethylene covering) and will then construct the greenhouse, where tomatoes and greens will be grown throughout the year. Sulkhan will work in the greenhouse himself. He will sell the harvested products at the local open market. The income of the family will significantly increase, and they will be able to improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and construct a greenhouse.

loans.name: Angelita

texts.en:
Angelita is a 26-year-old married woman and a mother of three children from San Miguel, Bohol.

Angelita has been engaged in a rice-farming business together with her husband for more than eight years now. She is requesting a loan to buy fertilizer and pesticides. With this, she will be able to improve their farm.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pesticides.

loans.name: Hovhannes

texts.en:
Hovhannes is from Haykavan village of Shirak region. Hovhannes runs a farm. His livestock currently includes two cows, 15 sheep and 32 chickens. He cultivates wheat and potatoes as well as growing apple and pear trees. The farm is the only source of income for him. 

As Hovhannes has insufficient funds to expand his farm, he has applied for this loan. With the loan's help, Hovhannes will purchase seeds and fertilizer. This will enable him to undertake all the necessary work in the cultivation process and gather a good harvest. 

Hovhannes lives with his parents, and it is very important for him to gather a high income and ensure better living conditions for his family.

loans.use: to pay for seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Maria Auxiliadora

texts.es: Maria, una humilde campesina de 55 años, casada, madre de 7 hijos, originaria de León, fue beneficiada con un crédito, le trajo cambios positivo logro comprar insumos necesarios que necesitaba para sembrar yuca vendió su producción, y fue muy buena venta. Ahora desea continuar con uno de sus proyectos el cual es la crianza de cerdos, ella está necesitando el crédito para comprar 4 cerdos y concentrado para alimentarlos pues desea lograr tener su crianza de animales y salir adelante para conseguir nuevas formas de ingresos y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Maria, a humble farmer of 55 years, is married and has seven children. She is originally from Leon, was the beneficiary of a loan, which brought her positive changes. She was able to purchase items necessary to sow yuca and sold what she produced, and it was a very good sale. Now, she wants to continue with one of her projects which is the raising of pigs. She needs a loan to purchase four pigs and feed to nourish them, since she wants to raise animals to get ahead and create new forms of income to increase her quality of life.

loans.use: To purchase 4 pigs and feed to nourish them.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is a 37-year-old Lebanese married man. He lives with his wife, Sonia, the mother of his three children. Cooperating together, they are capable to cover their expenses, especially their children’s study fees. 

Mohammad owns a grocery store. He sells all kinds of candies, juices, soft drinks and many other products. Today, he’s asking for a loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l. to increase his inventory of these products. In that way, he will be able to diversify his items and therefore, increase his revenues and thus, his way of living. Mohammad looks forward to opening his own supermarket in the near future.

loans.use: to increase his inventory of candies, juices, soft drinks, etc.

loans.name: Annalie

texts.en:
Annalie is a 31-year-old married woman and a mother of three young children from San Miguel, Bohol. Annalie is in the rice-farming business. She helps her husband in tilling their lot.

Annalie is asking for a loan to buy fertilizer and pesticides. With this loan, Annalie believes that she can improve their farming business and augment their income.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pesticides.

loans.name: Amparo Lineth

texts.es:
Amparo de 58 años de edad, es una mujer que busca como ganarse la vida. Ha trabajado en varios empleos informales, debido a su carencia educativa, su mayor reto ha sido sacar sus hijos adelante, a pesar de las adversidades que ha tenido que enfrentar. Se dedicó a la cría de cerdos, pero la actividad no le generó los ingresos necesarios para subsistir, por lo cual optó con colocar en su vivienda una sala de videojuegos por sugerencia de sus vecinos.
En la actualidad labora con la ayuda de uno de sus hijos, mientras ella se ocupa de los quehaceres del hogar.
Amparo se encuentra satisfecha con la actividad que realiza debido  a que sus ingresos han mejorado, por lo cual se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de tres televisores y tres play station con el fin de ampliar su cobertura y atender a un mayor número de clientes. 
Sueña con mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y alcanzar el punto de equilibrio en su negocio.
texts.en:
Amparo is 58 years old, and is a woman that is looking to earn a living. She has worked in various forms of informal employment, on account of a lack of education. Her challenge has been to get her children ahead, in spite of the adversities she has had to face. She worked raising pigs, but the activity didn't generate enough income to live, and so she has decided to turn her house into a gaming hall at the suggestion of her neighbors. Currently, she works with the help of one of three children, while she does the household chores.
Amparo is satisfied with the activity that she is doing, since her income has improved, so now she is asking for a loan to invest in the purchase of three televisions and three Playstations, with the goal of increasing her capacity and seeing to more clients.
She dreams of increasing the quality of life of her family and reaching the equilibrium point in her business.

loans.use: To purchase three televisions and three playstations for her gaming hall business.

loans.name: Noe Eriberto

texts.es: Noé Eriberto vive junto a s compañera de vida y sus dos hijos en casa propia. Él se dedica a la venta de semilla de marañón desde hace aproximadamente veinte años,  tiene mucha experiencia en la venta lo que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, el comercia de forma ambulante y desde su hogar, siempre busca las zonas mas estratégicas para las ventas, es muy conocido en la localidad pues siempre tiene lo que las personas necesitan con producto de calidad y a precio accesible además el servicio es excelente; Noé es un hombre dedicado a su labor y con muchas ganas de salir adelante, siempre está a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades que le permitan concretar su objetivo de llegar al éxito, desde hace algún tiempo la demanda  de su producto ha aumentado al doble y no quiere decepcionarlos por eso ha decidido aumentar la producción e invertir es así como le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de marañón por mayor etc. Noé Eriberto tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez darle a su familia una vida mejor.
texts.en:
Noé Eriberto lives with his wife and their two children in their own house. He works selling cashew seeds, and has done so for about 20 years. He has a lot of experience in sales which allows him to obtain a greater income. He works door-to-door and from his home, always looking for more strategic areas to make his sales, and is very well-known in the area since he always has what people need, such as high-quality products at accessible prices, and besides, his service is excellent. Noé is a man who is very dedicated to his labor and who has dreams of getting ahead. He is always looking for new opportunities that will allow him to complete his objective of being successful.

Over a short period of time, the demand for his product has doubled, and since he cannot disappoint his customers, he has decided to increase his production and invest. It is for that reason that he is asking for a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow him to purchase cashew seeds wholesale. Noé Eriberto has good references and is very responsible. He assures us that he will be able to pay the debt and give his family a better life.

loans.use: semilla de marañón por mayor

loans.name: Crispina

texts.en:
Crispina earns a living through her sari-sari (or variety) store business. She has been in this venture for more than 20 years now. This is the source of her income. She sells various goods and commodities to the people in her place.

Crispina is asking for a loan to buy more stock to sell like canned goods, candies, rice, soda, soap, toiletries and other items. With this loan, she will be be able to cater to and attract more buyers in her store, thus augmenting her sales and income.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell like canned goods, candies, rice, soda, soap, toiletries and other items.

loans.name: Roland

texts.en:
Roland is a 29-year-old single Lebanese man. He lives alone at a house located in one of the beautiful Lebanese towns. He was working days and nights to be able to manage his expenses and business operations as well. He owns a small mini-market where he sells all kinds of dairy and daily-use products. He also has a coffee machine. He’s well-known for being kind and friendly with his clients. 

Today, he’s asking for a youth loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l. to purchase the needed quantity of food provisions. In this way, he will be able to increase his revenues thus improve his way of living. He looks forward to expanding his grocery, and waits for the perfect time to open other branches and hire people to work with him.

loans.use: to purchase the needed quantity of food provisions

loans.name: Ma. Amie

texts.en:
Ma. Amie is 45 years old and married with four children. She lives in Calamba, Misamis Occidental. To earn a living, she is in the business of banana production in the local community. She has been in her business for over 6 years and earns 4,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) every month. 

She joined GDMPC in the year 2009, and now she has requested a loan of 7,000 PHP to purchase fertilizer such as manure. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer such as manure.

loans.name: Nesa

texts.en: Nesa is 56 years old and married with three children. She lives in Calamba, Misamis Occidental. To earn a living, Nesa operates a banana production farm in the local community. She has been with her business for over 10 years and earns 7,000 PHP every month. Nesa joined GDMPC in 2010, and now she has requested a loan of 10,000 PHP to purchase fertilizer such as manure. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer such as manure

loans.name: Marivic

texts.en:
Marivic is 46 years old and has children she sends to school. She is raising hogs for income. Her spouse is a farmer and a local official. She would like to keep raising healthy hogs; that is why she is asking for a loan of PHP 5,000 for extra capital to buy feed and medicine for her hogs.

Someday, Marivic hopes to become a successful hog raiser and maintain good income for the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy feed and medicine for her hogs

loans.name: Saturai

texts.en:
Saturai is a 40 years old hardworking gentleman. He is married and a father of four children. His wife is a business lady who also brings some additional income to the family. He is a livestock trader in the Narok area and has been running the business for the past four years making a monthly income of KES 25,000

He has borrowed a second loan of KES 40,000 from KADET LTD which he intends to use to purchase more livestock for fattening and to sell at a profit. 

The anticipated profit will be reinvested to boost his business. His future dream is to build his family a permanent house.

loans.use: to purchase livestock to fatten and sell

loans.name: Ángela María

texts.es:
Ángela es una joven de 29 años, llena de sueños y con una hija de 6 años de edad que es su mayor motivación para salir adelante. Su condición de madre soltera le ha enseñado a pensar y a vivir la vida de una manera más responsable, entendiendo que su familia es lo más importante y por lo que debe luchar cada día. 
Desde muy joven ha laborado debido a la difícil situación económica de su familia, gracias a esto aprendió de confección y hoy esta actividad le ha dado la oportunidad de generar los recursos para sostener a su hija.
Ángela montó en su casa un pequeño taller, en donde se dedica principalmente a la confección a terceros ya que asegura que es más rentable
Se encuentra solicitando un crédito para la compra de una máquina plana 204, que le permitirá reducir tiempos de producción, generando mejores utilidades que se transformarán en mejor calidad de vida para su familia.
texts.en:
Ángela is a young woman of 29 years, full of dreams. She has a daughter 6 years of age who is her greatest motivation to get ahead. Her status as a single mother has taught her to think and to live a life in more responsible manner, understanding that her family is the most important and that for which she should fight every day.
Since she was very young she has worked, due to her family's difficult economic situation. Thanks to this, she learned clothing manufacturing and today this work has given her the opportunity to generate the resources to support her daughter.
Angela set up a small shop in her home, in which she principally manufactures clothing to third parties, as that ensures to be more profitable. She is requesting a loan for the purchase of a 204 flat machine, which will allow her to reduce production times, generating more profits which will transform into a greater quality of life for her family.

loans.use: to purchase a 204 flat machine

loans.name: Rosa Amelia

texts.es: Rosa Amelia vive junto a su compañero de vida en casa propia, ella se dedica a la compra y venta de frutas y verduras, fresas, plátanos, naranjas, tomates, cebollas, chiles entre otros tiene varios años con el negocio y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia en las ventas que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, el lugar donde comercia es muy estratégico para la actividad y además muy concurrido de personas, ya tiene mucha clientela que la prefiere porque su producto es fresco, a buen precio, de calidad y  con un excelente servicio; Rosa es una mujer emprendedora, dedicada a su labor con muchas ganas de salir adelante, siempre esta buscando alternativas que le permitan alcanzar el éxito, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda y quiere aprovechar para realizar una nueva inversión pero no posee de suficiente capital que la respalde por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar frutas y verduras por mayor. Rosa Amelia tiene buenas referencias de pago, esta agradecida con el apoyo y asegura que podrá saldar la deuda, a la vez confía que le dará a su familia una vida mejor.
texts.en: Rosa Amelia lives with her life partner in her own house. She buys and sells fruits and vegetables, strawberries, bananas, oranges, tomatoes, onions, and chiles, among others. She has had the business for several years, and this has given her a lot of sales experience that allows her to obtain the best earnings. The location where she sells is very strategic for the activity and is also very busy with people. She already has a lot of customers who prefer her because her product is fresh, well-priced, and of high quality, and there is excellent service. Rosa is an entrepreneurial woman, dedicated to her work and with a lot of desire to move ahead. She is always looking for alternatives that will allow her to achieve success. In the last few weeks demand has increased, and she wants to take advantage of it to make a new investment, but she does not have sufficient capital to back her in this. That is why she is asking Integral for a loan that will allow her to buy wholesale fruits and vegetables. Rosa Amelia has good payment references. She is thankful for the support and says that she will be able to pay the debt. At the same time she is confident that she will give her family a better life.

loans.use: to purchase wholesale fruit and vegetables

loans.name: Ronalyn

texts.en:
Ronalyn generates income by selling grocery items to the people in her village. Ronalyn is 22 years old, married and has a child. She had been in her business for over a year now and earns 1,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) each month. She is now asking for a loan of 5,000 PHP to invest in selling more merchandise in her store. She will buy sardines, eggs, breads, noodles, soap and shampoo to sell. 

Ronalyn will keep improving the products and services she offers to gain more profits and save for education purposes.

loans.use: to buy sardines, eggs, breads, noodles, soap and shampoo to sell.

loans.name: Marcos

texts.en:
Marcos is a merchant from Trinidad, Bohol. He engages in the buying and selling of livestock animals like pigs, chickens, and goats.
Marcos needs additional capital to expand his business. He is applying for a loan to buy different kinds of goods and livestock like chickens, goats, and pigs. 
In the future, Marcos hopes to make his business productive and sustainable.

loans.use: to buy goods and livestock like chickens, goats, and pigs to sell

loans.name: Maria Mercedes

texts.es:
Maria de 47 años  de edad, originaria de León, casada, madre de 7 hijos, todos mayores de edad, actualmente solo 1 estudia y los demás trabajan, de oficio comerciante, se dedica a la compra y venta de cerdos de la que es propietaria hace mas  de 10 años,  ella  solo logro finalizar su tercer grado de primaria, debido a las condiciones económica de su familia. Inicio su actividad laboral  con capital propio a la edad de 37 años, pudo comprar poco a poco mas cerdo para aumentar su producción de animales, se vio en la necesidad de buscar mas financiamiento ya que la demanda de la venta de cerdos aumento,  por sus clientes eran cada vez mayor, negocio que le genera ganancias a diarias, ya que cuenta con clientes fijos, este ha sido su primer negocio.
Maria esta requiriendo el financiamiento para comprar 10 cerdos, cemolina (alimentos para cerdos) y alambre. Con el objetivo de mantener sus animales en mejores condiciones y construir una galera para que sus cerditos tengan un mejor lugar, ella estima que este crédito le ayudara a comprar más cerdo, ya que de esta manera podrá vender a un mejor precio, para obtener buenos ingresos.
texts.en:
Maria is 47 years old. A native of León, she is married and she has 7 grown-up children: only 1 of them is currently studying, while the others have a job. She is a retailer, having been engaged in buying and selling pigs for 10 years. Due to her family’s economic conditions, she has succeeded in completing third grade of primary school only. She started her activity with her own capital when se was 37, and little by little she has succeeded in buying more pigs to increase her production. She then found herself in need to ask for funding because of an increase in the requests for pig selling as well as in the number of her customers. This is the first job she has had, and through this activity she earns a daily income, and she can count on established customers.
Maria is requesting a loan to buy 10 pigs, semolina (pigs feed) and barbed wire, in order to provide better conditions to her animals and to build a shed to make her pigs live in a better place. She thinks that the loan will help her buying more pigs, and that she will be able to sell them for a better price, thus gaining a better income.

loans.use: To buy 10 pigs, semolina (pigs feed) and barbed wire.

loans.name: Aroldo Antonio

texts.es:
Aroldo de 51 años de edad, vive en el municipio de Caucasia, Antioquia, Colombia, en donde labora comercializando sandia por unidades. Esta actividad se ha convertido en su única fuente de ingresos para el sostenimiento de su familia compuesta por su esposa y sus hijos. Todos los días debe levantarse a las cuatro de la mañana a comenzar su faena. Se dirige a la plaza de mercado en donde realiza la compra del producto al por mayor con el propósito de generar ganancias a escala. Posteriormente, se ubica en un pequeño espacio del parque principal en donde distribuye su producto.

Su mayor sueño es poder generar los recursos necesarios para establecer su negocio en un punto estratégico del municipio y posicionarlo en el mercado, con el fin de generar mejores ingresos que le permitan mejorar la condición de vida en su hogar.  Estas son las razones que motivan a Aroldo a solicitar un crédito e invertir en la compra de sandia.
texts.en:
51 year old Aroldo lives in the town of Caucasia, Antioquia, Colombia, where he works selling watermelon by the unit. This work has become his only source of profits for the sustenance  of his family, composed of his spouse and his children. Each day, he gets up at four in the morning to start his job. He goes to the marketplace where he purchases the product in bulk, for the purpose of generating profits to scale. Later he is located in a small space of the main park, where he distributes his product. 
His greatest dream is to be able to generate the necessary resources to establish his business in a strategic location of the town, and position it in the marketplace with the goal of generating better profits, which allow him to improve the condition of life in his household. These are the reasons which motivate Aroldo to request a loan and to invest in the purchase of watermelon.

loans.use: to purchase watermelon.

loans.name: Freddy Antonio

texts.es: El Joven Freddy, Luchador y trabajador, habita en el municipio de la Concepcion en el Barrio San Caralampio junto a sa familia su mayor sueño es mejorar de condiciones, actualmente el es comerciante de Frutas y Verduras desde hace 3 años con este financiamiento comprara Frutas y verduras para aumentar su Inventario y obtener asi mejores ingresos, Agradece el apoyo que Afodenic y Fondos Kiva le han brindado al otorgarle este credito
texts.en: Young Freddy, fighter and hardworker, lives the town of Concepcion in the San Caralampio neighborhood with his family. His greatest dream is to improve conditions. Nowadays, he sells fruits and vegetables. He has done this for 3 years. With this loan, he will purchase fruits and vegetables to increase his inventory and thus earn better profits. He is grateful for the support that Afodenic and the Kiva loans have offered in granting him this loan.

loans.use: to purchase fruits and vegetables

loans.name: Astrid Elena

texts.es:
“Mis hijos han sido mi mayor aliciente para encontrar razones que me hagan vibrar de alegría y me motiven a luchar por un mejor futuro,” con esta frase Astrid de 41 años de edad, radicada en el municipio de Rionegro, Colombia, narra el porqué ama lo que hace y la satisfacción que le genera ver a su familia feliz. 
Desde hace tres años tomó la decisión de separarse de su cónyuge y en ese instante asumió las responsabilidades del hogar. Convertirse en padre y madre es el hecho más difícil que ha asumido en su vida, ya que las condiciones económicas no le permiten dedicarse de tiempo completo a su familia. Motivada por sacar a sus hijos adelante esta mujer tomó la iniciativa de preparar alimentos para comercializarlos en los diferentes establecimientos de la su localidad, de esta manera genera ingresos para cubrir sus necesidades básicas.
Su mayor sueño es montar un restaurante, pero considera que este proyecto será a mediano plazo, Por el momento se encuentran solicitando un crédito que destinará en la compra de productos de la canasta familiar al por mayor con el propósito de aumentar la rentabilidad de su negocio y contribuir con el mejoramiento de la calidad de vida de sus familia.
texts.en:
“My children have been my greatest reason to be filled with joy and to motivate me to struggle for a better future.”  With this sentence, 41 year old Astrid, who is from the Rionegro municipality in Colombia, tells why she loves what she does.  She tells of the satisfaction she gets from seeing her family happy.

Three years ago she made the decision to separate from her husband.  In that moment she took on the responsibilities of the household.  Becoming father and mother is the most difficult thing she has done in her life.  This is because her financial situation did not allow her to devote herself to her family full time.  

Motivated by wanting to get her children ahead, this woman took the initiative to prepare food to sell at the different establishments in her area.  This way she generates income in order to cover their basic necessities.

Her biggest dream is to establish a restaurant.  However, she feels that this will be a medium term project.  

She is now requesting a loan to buy basic needs products wholesale.  She will do this in order to increase the profitability of her business and to contribute to improving her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy basic needs products wholesale.

loans.name: Anonymous
