His wife works at a hotel as a cleaner and receptionist. His elder daughter studies at a high school. His other two children, who are 2 and 7 years old respectively, both go to kindergarten. 

Sergelenkhuu has been working as a field engineer for a private business for six years. The house the family lives in has been deteriorating over the years and needs some serious repair. In winter time, due to the house's vulnerable walls and ceilings, the family lives in very cold conditions, especially when they are short on coal. 

In order to provide his family with a comfortable and warm living environment, Sergelenkhuu has decided to renovate his house. So he is requesting a loan of 4,500,000 MNT to purchase building and insulation materials, including but not limited to fiberglass, hardwood floors, glue and wallpaper. During this time of year, the price of building materials reaches its lowest rate so it is a good time to buy these materials. 

After the repairs have been made, the family will be able to live with joy and happiness due to having a warm house. This also will enable the family to burn less coal, thereby reducing air pollution. (In Mongolia, air pollution is mainly caused by the burning of coal.) The borrower is a very hardworking individual who deeply cares about the well-being of his family and strives for a better future.

loans.use: to purchase insulation and building materials.

loans.name: Bayarsaikhan

texts.en:
Mr. Bayarsaikhan, 35 years old, lives with his wife and two children in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. The family resides in a traditional Mongolian ger (portable felt dwelling) on a plot of land.

Bayarsaikhan, who has been rendering a taxi service to local people for 11 years, has accumulated a vast amount of experience. Usually his wife drives during the day, and in the afternoon he continues the service. Because the automobile is used to provide taxi service day and night, it is very prone to damage and deterioration. Bayarsaikhan is therefore requesting a loan of 1500000 MNT to purchase spare parts.

The loan will help the couple to generate more income for their children, who are now three and four years old. With each passing day their expenses increase, thus requiring their parents to work hard. The borrower is a very hardworking individual who strives for a better future.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts.

loans.name: Leonel Antonio

texts.es: Leonel Antonio vive junto a su compañera de vida  y sus  hijos, él se dedica a la venta de tostadas de yuca, papa, y plátano, ademas para complementar sus gastos cultiva maiz es muy conocido pues tiene varios años con el negocio comercia de forma ambulante en la zona donde reside y en los diferentes alrededores de la localidad, tiene mucha clientela gracias a su amplia experiencia en las ventas, siempre obtienen las mejores ganancias, posee los mejores precios, producto de calidad y un excelente servicio; Leonel es un hombre entregado a su labor, enérgico y muy luchador siempre esta buscando las mejores alternativas que le abran camino al éxito, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda y como todo buen comerciante quiere aprovechar para realizar una nueva inversión que le genere mas ganancias pero para ello necesita de capital que lo respalde por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar plátanos, yuca, papa, bolsas, etc. Leonel Antonio tiene buenas referencias de pago, asegura poder saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene la confianza que le dará a su familia una vida mejor.
texts.en:
Leonel Antonio lives with her life partner and their children. He works selling toasts of manioc, potatoes and bananas, and also cultivates corn as a complement to cover expenses. After several years in business working as a street seller in his area of residence and surroundings, he's become very well known. He has many clients thanks to his broad selling experience and always obtains the best income, offers the best prices and quality, and provides an excellent service. Leonel is dedicated to his job, energetic and tenacious, and is always seeking the best ways towards success. 

Over the last few weeks he has seen an increase in demand and, as every good salesman would do, he wants to seize the opportunity to make a new investment to increase earnings. For this purpose, he needs some back-up capital, which is why he's requesting INTEGRAL a loan to buy bananas, manioc, potatoes, bags, etc. Leonel Antonio has a good payment track record and claims he'll be able to clear his debt. He's also confident he'll be able to provide his family with a better life.

loans.use: to buy bananas, manioc, potatoes and bags.

loans.name: Maria Francisca

texts.es: María Francisca vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus tres hijos en casa propia, ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta de canastos y cestas de muchos diseños que ella misma crea tiene un don inigualable que le permite cada dia mejorar en su labor, tiene varios años con el negocio y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia en la venta que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, su negocio esta ubicado en su vivienda y es muy conocido por las personas de la localidad donde viven,  tiene mucha clientela y la prefieren por la calidad, los buenos  precios y sobre todo por  un buen servicio; María es una mujer comprometida, dedicada a  su labor y con muchas ganas de salir adelante y cumplir sus metas,  todos los días trabaja duro para poder alcanzar el éxito y no piensa rendirse hasta lograrlo, quiere acrecentar el negocio y para ello necesita de capital que la respalde por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar hilos por mayor, cuerda, etc. María Francisca tiene buenas referencias de pago y una moral intachable se siente contenta con la colaboración, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y  la vez tiene fe que le dará a su familia una vida plena como se la merecen.
texts.en:
María Francisca lives with her husband and three children in their own house. She makes and sells different kinds of baskets; she also creates various designs for them. María has a unique gift for this work which allows her to improve what she does with every day that passes. She’s had the business for several years so has much sales experience resulting in improved profits.

Her business is located in her house and is well-known by people in the area where she lives. She has many customers who choose to go to her because of the quality of work, the fair prices, and above all the service she provides.

María is a committed person, dedicated to her work, and with a great desire to get ahead and reach her goals. Every day she works hard to be successful and doesn’t even think of stopping until she is. 

As she wants to grow the business, María needs capital so she has asked for a loan from INTEGRAL to buy thread, cord, and other materials.  She has a good credit rating and an untarnished reputation. She is very happy to be working with INTEGRAL and is certain that she will be able to make the repayments, and at the same time give her family all that they deserve.

loans.use: buy thread, cord, and other materials

loans.name: Sengesamba

texts.en:
Mr. Sengesamba is 46 years old and lives with his wife and two children in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. The family resides in a traditional Mongolian ger (portable felt dwelling) on his sister’s plot of land. His wife works as a fuel dispenser at a petroleum-importing company. His two children both go to secondary school. 

Sengesamba has been operating a carpenter’s workshop since 2012. Now the business has stabilized and he has even hired two people on a full-time basis. Before this business, he purchased and sold coal at wholesale prices to local people. Also, during the summer time, he renders transportation of goods and services at an outdoor market. 

He is requesting a loan of 1,700,000 MNT to purchase tools and equipment such as an air compressor, generator, circular saw and extension cords. As a result, he will be able to generate more income for his family as well as produce high-quality products, thus increasing consumer satisfaction.

loans.use: to purchase tools and equipment such as an air compressor, generator, circular saw and extension cords.

loans.name: Bekhbayar

texts.en:
Mr. Bekhbayar, 37 years old, lives with his wife and 1-year-old son in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. His wife has a position as an accountant at a bakery and also stays at home to care for her son. 

Bekhbayar has been rendering transportation services since 2008. Before this business, he worked in Korea as a contract worker. He is requesting a loan of 3,500,000 MNT to purchase a sofa and wardrobe as well as repair his automobile's brakes. As a result, his family will be able to live in a comfortable place and he will be able to work enthusiastically due to his new braking system. 

The borrower is a very hardworking individual who cares deeply for his wife and son.

loans.use: to purchase a sofa and wardrobe as well as repair his automobile's brakes.

loans.name: Mario Filadelfo

texts.es: Mario Filadelfo vive junto a su compañera de vida Blanca y sus dos hijos en casa propia; él posee un comedor  donde vende ricos platillos sopas, carnes, ensaladas, bebidas entre otros, tiene varios años con el negocio y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia en la venta lo que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, comercia en un lugar que califico como excelente para sus actividades  ya tiene mucha clientela y las personas lo prefieren porque todo lo que comercia es de calidad, a precios accesibles y con un servicio inigualable siempre a la orden del cliente; Mario es un hombre emprendedor, dedicado a su labor, y todo un soñador, todos los días lucha por cumplir cada una de sus metas y se esforzara al máximo hasta lograr ese éxito, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda pues las comidas con exquisitas y como todo buen comerciante desea aprovechar para acrecentar el negocio, pero necesita de capital que lo respalde porque sus compras son al contado por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita carnes, verduras, granos basicos, bebidas, etc. Mario Filadelfo tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene la esperanza en que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Mario Filadelfo lives with his wife Blanca and their two children in their own home. He owns a restaurant where he sells delicious soups, meat dishes, salads, drinks etc. He’s had the restaurant for several years so has much sales experience resulting in improved profits. It’s located in an excellent spot so he has many customers who choose to eat there because of the quality food, fair prices, and exemplary service.

Mario is a hardworking man, dedicated to his work, and with a vision of the future. Every day he works hard to reach one of his goals and doesn’t stop until he has. These last weeks have seen an increased demand for his wonderful food so, like all good businessmen, he wishes to take advantage of the situation and grow his business. As he has to buy everything with cash, he has approached INTEGRAL for a loan to buy meat, vegetables, basic grains, drinks etc. He has a good credit rating and is a responsible person.  He is certain that he will be able to make the repayments, and at the same time give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: buy meat, vegetables, basic grains, drinks etc.

loans.name: Otgonbayar

texts.en:
Mrs. Otgonbayar, who is 24 years old, lives with her sister in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. Just after graduating from a university, she began working as a nurse at a health center for mothers and their children. Becoming a fine doctor is her childhood dream, and she is still pursuing her dream to this day. 

Otgonbayar has two brothers, both of whom run their own businesses. She is requesting a loan of 3,000,000 MNT to purchase furniture such as a sofa, wardrobe, etc. For the upcoming Mongolian traditional holiday known as White Moon, she wants to decorate her home with new furniture as a symbol of welcoming the new year with new beginnings.  

The borrower is a very hardworking and honest individual who strives to live a better life.

loans.use: to purchase furniture such as a sofa, wardrobe, etc.

loans.name: Ezekiel

texts.en:
Ezekiel is a 43-year-old mechanic, taxi driver and transporter of light goods in Mishomuhoroni, Mombasa. He is married and has been doing well in this business for the last fifteen years.

This marks Ezekiel's second loan from KADET LTD and he will use it to purchase spare parts for his taxi. He plans to plow the anticipated profit back into the business. He serviced the previous loan successfully. 

He hopes to own more taxis in the future.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts for his taxi

loans.name: Gerber Antonio

texts.es: Gerber de 59 años de edad, Es un hombre muy alegre, con la vida que Dios le ha dado y la oportunidades de tener una feliz familia conformada por su esposa y sus hijos, que son su mayor fuente de inspiración a realizar lo mejor de sí y darlo sin medida confiando en que a su familia jamás le ha faltado nada. Es muy responsable y dedicado en sus labores él se dedica a cultivar granos básicos siendo estos maíz y sorgo, con entusiasmo realiza esta actividad y lo hace con el mayor esfuerzo para que en su hogar siempre exista el alimento diario. Gerber desea invertir más en la compra de insumos agrícolas como: Abono, Herbicida, fertilizantes, entre otros. Agradece desde ya todas las bendiciones que Dios le ha dado y confía plenamente que exista la esperanza de que su condición de vida mejore en gran medida.
texts.en:
Gerber, 59, is pleased with the life God gave him and the chance to have a happy family, which comprises his wife and children. They are his source of inspiration to do his best and to make sure they never lack what they need. He is very responsible and dedicated to his work.

Gerber eagerly and energetically grows basic grain crops, corn and soya, so that his family always has food on the table. He wants to buy more agricultural supplies such as manure, weed killer, and fertilizer. He thanks God for his blessings and is confident in his expectations to significantly improve his standard of living.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies such as manure, weed killer, and fertilizer.

loans.name: Mbenyu

texts.en:
Mbenyu is a 31-year-old married mother of four who lives in Samburu, Kenya. She is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a charcoal store business at her rural home. Her major monthly expenses are her children's school fees.

Mbenyu is seeking a loan amounting to 50,000 Kenyan shillings (KES) to buy more sacks of charcoal. She is grateful for this opportunity.

loans.use: to buy sacks of charcoal.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to cover the cost of opening a new hardware store.

loans.name: Rosa Margarita

texts.es: Rosa Margarita vive junto a sus  hijos en casa propia, ella se dedica a la confección y venta de carteras en variedad y con diferentes estilos únicos al gusto del cliente, tiene varios años con el negocio y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, el negocio esta ubicado en su vivienda y es muy conocido por las personas del lugar, se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues las personas saben que todo es de calidad, a precios accesibles y con un servicio inigualable siempre a la orden y al gusto de los clientes; Rosa es una mujer activa y decidida, muy dedicada a su labor y muy luchadora día con día se esfuerza al máximo para ganarse una vida mejor y un gran éxito para el futuro, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda y quiere aprovechar para una nueva inversión, pero no posee de suficiente capital que la respalde por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar tela por mayor, hilos, cierres etc. Rosa Margarita tiene buenas referencias de pago y una moral intachable, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene la esperanza que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Rosa Margarita lives with her children in her own house.  She earns a living making and selling a variety of purses in different unique styles, according to the customers' tastes.

She has had the business for several years, which has given her a lot of experience that allows her to get the best profits.  The business is located in her home and she's well known among the people in the area.  She has acquired a lot of customers because people know that everything is high quality at affordable prices with incomparable service.  She's always ready to serve her customers.

Rosa's an active and determined woman who is devoted to her job and strives a lot.  Every day she makes the maximum effort to get a better life and a successful future for herself.

Demand has grown in the past few weeks and she wants to take advantage of it with a new investment.  She doesn't have sufficient capital to support the investment, though, so she's asking Integral for a loan to buy fabric wholesale, thread, zippers, etc.

Rosa Margarita has a good payment record and an impeccable character.  She's certain she'll be able to repay the debt and also hopes she'll bring economic security to her household.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread, and zippers

loans.name: Jamilton Olindo

texts.es: Jamilton de 25 años de edad habita junto a su esposa y sus hijos en casa propia. Gracias a Dios es un hombre muy emprendedor, decidido a ser un gran padre y esposo. Siempre con deseos de superación ha trabajado para que en su hogar jamás haga falta el pan de cada día, siendo así esa persona responsable por su familia que le importa tener las mejores beneficios para los suyos. Jamilto cosecha maíz ,frijol y sorgo esa es su fuente de ingresos y se siente orgulloso pues en su hogar es el único que trabaja y le brida lo mejor a su familia con sus dos manos y el sudor de su frente cada día. El desea cosecha más pues necesita mayores ingresos es por eso que solicita a INTEGRAL un préstamo para la compra de insumos agrícolas como semillas, abonos, fertilizantes y pesticidas ya que confía mucho en sus capacidades y que todo le ira bien con este préstamo. Espera seguir siendo ese hombre ejemplar y su familia se siga sintiendo orgullosa de el.
texts.en:
Jamilton, 25, lives with his wife and children in their own house. He is enterprising, and thanks to God, determined to be a good father and husband. He has always wanted to be successful and responsible. He works hard to earn the most income he can to provide for his family's needs.  

Jamilto grows corn, beans, and sorghum to earn a living and is proud to be the breadwinner in his family. He offers his family the best with his labor and the sweat of his brow. He wants to increase his harvest because he needs more income. He is applying to INTEGRAL for a loan to buy agricultural supplies such as seed, manure, fertilizer, and pesticide. He is confident in his skills and in the outcome of the investment. He expects to continue to be a model family man that his family is proud of.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies such as seed, manure, fertilizer, and pesticide.

loans.name: Chizi

texts.en: Chizi is 29 years old, married and the mother of two children. She lives with her family in Samburu, Kenya in a solar-powered home which they build on their own. Chizi earns a living by selling water. She has been in this line of work for four years and is requesting a loan for KSH. 50,000 to buy a water tank, because this will allow her to do a better job of meeting her customer's needs.

loans.use: to buy a water-storage tank.

loans.name: Mchicha Group

texts.en:
Mariam, who is in her mid 30s, is married, with five children and one orphan. One of her children is still in school and the orphan also goes to school. 

Mariam has been running two businesses, selling charcoal and fabrics, which she sells door-to-door. She works from 9.00 AM to 6.30 PM daily and is able to make a good monthly profit. 

This will Mariam's first loan from Tujijenge Tanzania which she wants to use for buying more sacks of charcoal. Mariam's dream is to one day be able to expand her business. 

Mariam will share this loan with her loan group, "Mchicha Group," with 12 members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy more sacks of charcoal.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en: Joseph is 35 years old, married and the father of three children. He and his family live in Samburu, Kenya in an electric-powered house which also has tap water. His main monthly expense is school fees for his children. He earns a living by raising and selling poultry and is requesting a loan for KSH. 25,000 to buy more livestock. He wishes to express his gratitude for the support he receives from Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to buy more poultry to raise and sell.

loans.name: Henry Alberto

texts.es: Henry de 39 años de edad, habita junto a su familia, su esposa y sus hijos. En la zona donde reside es  muy conocido por ser trabajador, honesto, emprendedor puesto que siempre ha realizado más mejores labores en su hogar, siendo el responsable del llevar el sustento diario a su hogar y lo hace con lo único que sabe hacer cultiva maíz y sorgo, Cada mañana se levanta con las mejores ilusiones de realizar esta actividad deseando la bendición de Dios en su trabajo, desea comprar insumos agrícolas para en estas cosechas tener los mejores productos es por eso que solicita a INTEGRAL un préstamo para la compra de : semillas, abonos, fertilizantes y pesticidas. Teniendo en cuanta que se compromete en saldar la cuenta antes de lo previsto ya que jamás le ha gustado quedarle mal a nadie y posee excelentes referencias de pago. A el lo único que le interesa es que su familia vea el esfuerzo que cada día el realiza y que a ellos nunca les falte nada.
texts.en: Henry, 39, lives with his wife and children.  His neighbors say that he is honest, hard-working and enterprising.  He is responsible for supporting his family and does so in the best way he knows how: maize and sorghum farming.  He gets up every morning praying that, with God's help, he can carry out everything that he has to do to maintain the farm.  He is applying for an INTEGRAL loan that he will use to buy the supplies he needs for his business: seeds, manure, fertilizer and pesticides.  He hopes to repay the loan ahead of schedule and has excellent references.  The most important things for him are working hard for his family and making sure that they have everything they need.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, etc. for his farming business.

loans.name: Peninah

texts.en: Peninah is 48 years old, married and helps support a family of six people. She earns a living by running a retail shop where she has earned an income of KES. 48,000 a month for the last eight years. She has successfully taken out and repaid six previous loans from KADET LTD and is requesting a new loan, for KES. 100,000, to buy more items to sell to her customers, including sugar, salt, crates of soft drinks and maize flour. She plans to use the additional income she will earn to pay school fees for her children and expand her business. Her goals for the future are to improve her family's living standards, be financially stable and pay school fees and expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Gustavo Adolfo

texts.es: Gustavo de 41 años de edad, vive junto a su familia su esposa y sus hijos en casa propia. Con diversas actividades y responsabilidades sus vecinos lo caracterizan por ser muy emprendedor ya que con deseos de superación ha logrado que su familia se mantenga siempre con el alimento diario. Se dedica a la agricultura de granos básicos siendo este maíz y frijol y también cereales. Gracias Dios siempre ha tenido los mejores cultivos de la zona  pero el desea comprar insumos agrícolas antes que se acerquen las próximas cosechas es por eso que solicita  INTEGRAL un préstamo para la compra de insumos agrícolas como: semillas, abono, fertilizantes, pesticidas entre otros. Espera contar con la ayuda solicitada y así su familia seguirá teniendo una buena y estable condición de vida.
texts.en: Gustavo, 41, owns a house where he lives with his wife and children.  His neighbors say that he is very enterprising and point to his many sources of income.  He works hard to get ahead because his family depends on him.  Gustavo has a farming business.  He plants maize, beans and cereals and harvests the best crops in the area.  He is applying for an INTEGRAL loan that he will use to buy supplies for his business: seeds, manure, fertilizer, pesticides, etc.  He is counting on the loan to provide the help he needs to ensure a good and stable life for his family.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertlizer, etc. for his farming business.

loans.name: Justine

texts.en: Justine is 27 years old, married and the mother of three children. In 2003, she went into business by running a small beauty salon. She requested a loan, which she has since paid back, to more her business to a better and more strategic location. The move was a success and she is now requesting a new loan, for UGX. 1,500,000, to buy more cosmetics and equipment and to pay her rent. She supplements the income she earns from her beauty salon by singing songs and has already released several singles. Her goal for the future is to own a home where she can also operate her business so that she does not need to pay rent. She hopes to achieve her dreams for the future by making good use of loans like this one.

loans.use: to buy supplies and cosmetics for a beauty salon.

loans.name: Kisarawe One Group

texts.en:
Juliana, who is in her 40s, is a widow and a mother of four children. One of the children goes to school and the rest have completed their study. 

Since 2002, Juliana is managing her family costs by owning a hotel and doing catering activities. She works from 6am to 4pm, but sometimes until midnight, if she has a function in her hotel. She is able to make a very good profit per month. 

This loan request is Juliana's ninth loan from Kiva's field partner, Tujijenge Tanzania. Juliana's previous loans, all of which she successfully paid back, allowed her to increase her stocks of food items and buy catering server dishes and more plates. With the profit, she paid for household expenses, like food, paid her child's school fees, and built a house. 

Juliana will use this loan to buy a deep freezer for business activities. Her dream is to one day be able to buy a car.  

She will share this loan with her loan group, "Kisarawe One Group," which totals 17 members. The members of the group will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy a deep freezer for her business.

loans.name: Maria Magdalena

texts.es: María de 18 años de edad habita junto a su esposo y su hijo en casa propia es una mujer muy trabajadora, toda su vida se ha dedicado hacer una mujer ejemplar para su familia, muy responsable con sus qué haceres del hogar y de la mano de su esposo ayudan para que nunca les falte el pan de cada día. María se dedica a la labor de ser agricultora de granos básicos como maíz, frijol y además cultiva loroco y jocote. Siempre cada mañana se levanta con nuevos deseos de superación y emprende su día de labores cosechando y luego recolectando para vender cierta parte y otra dejarla para consumos propio. Ella desea comprar insumos agrícolas para estas nuevas cosechas próximas es por eso que solicita a INTEGRAL un préstamo para comprar: semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, pesticidas u otros. Así ella podrá seguir brindando una buena calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en: Maria, 18, owns a house where she lives with her husband and son.  She has worked hard to be a model homemaker, supporting her husband and taking care of her family, ensuring that they never go without their daily bread.  Maria has a farming business.  She grows basic grains: maize and beans, along with loroco and jocote.  She gets up every morning, urged on by the desire to get ahead, and spends her day taking care of her crop.  She harvests part of the crop for sale and part of it for her own use.  Maria is applying for an INTEGRAL loan that she will use to buy supplies for her business: seeds, manure, fertilizer, pesticides, etc.  The investment will allow her to provide her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, etc. for her farming business.

loans.name: Andres

texts.es: Andres de 41 años de edad vive junto a su esposa y sus hijos, en casa propia. Gracias a Dios es un hombre que toda su vida ha sido trabajador y ha sido un buen padre ejemplar para sus vecinos y a su vez siendo un gran ejemplo para sus hijos. Andres es responsable, atento, humilde pero con buenos deseos de superación su profesión es Agricultor siendo esta una actividad económica que consiste en la cosecha de granos basicos como son maiz y frijol y tabien tiene una tomatera.  Es así como día a día se gana la vida honradamente y nunca ha faltado el  pan en su hogar el desea comprar insumos agricolas como son semillas, abonos, fertilizantes entre otros. Es por eso que solicita este credito a  INTEGRAL el lo unico que  quiere seguirle brindando mejores condiciones de vida a su familia
texts.en:
Andres, age 41, lives with his wife and children in his own house.  Thanks to God, he has been a hard-working man all of his life.  He has been setting a good example of being a father for his neighbors and a good example for his children.

Andres is responsible, attentive, and humble.  He has a great desire for self-improvement in his profession, which is farming.  His business activity consists of harvesting basic grains like corn and beans.  He also has a tomato crop.  This is how he honorably earns a living day to day.  He has always provided his household with their daily bread.

He wishes to buy agricultural supplies like seeds, manure, and fertilizer, among others.  That is why he is requesting this loan from Integral.  The only thing that he wants is to continue giving his family better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies like seeds, manure, and fertilizer, among others.

loans.name: Dora Alicia

texts.es: Dora de 38 años de edad habita junto a su esposo y sus hijos en casa propia es una mujer muy trabajadora, toda su vida se ha dedicado hacer una mujer ejemplar para su familia, muy responsable con sus que haceres del hogar y de la mano de su esposo ayudan para que nunca les falte el pan de cada día. Dora se dedica a la venta de medicinas las mas principales como acetaminofen, dolofin, ibuprofeno entre otros y ademas  a la labor de ser agricultora de granos básicos como maíz, frijol y sorgo, Siempre cada mañana se levanta con nuevos deseos de superación y emprende su día de labores cosechando y luego recolectando para vender cierta parte y otra dejarla para consumos propio. Ella desea comprar insumos agrícolas para estas nuevas cosechas próximas es por eso que solicita a INTEGRAL un préstamo para comprar: semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, pesticidas u otros. Así ella podrá seguir brindando una buena calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Dora, 38, lives with her husband and children in their own house. She has worked hard and is determined to be a good example for her family. She does the household chores, and she and her husband make sure the family is provided for.  

Dora sells medicines, primarily acetaminophen, dolofin, and ibuprofen, and also grows basic grain crops such as corn, beans, and sorghum. She gets up every day with the desire to get ahead. She does her farm chores first. She sells part of the harvest and keeps the rest to feed her family. She wants to buy supplies for the upcoming harvest and is applying to INTEGRAL for a loan to buy seed, manure, fertilizer, and pesticide. This will help her to offer a good life to her family.

loans.use: to buy seed, manure, fertilizer, and pesticide.

loans.name: Mario Enrique

texts.es: Mario de 54 años de edad habita junto a su esposa y sus hijos. Es un hombre muy entregado al trabajo y a sus responsabilidades en el hogar ya que todas las personas lo conocen por ser muy responsable, honesto y sincero. Mario se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos maíz y frijol, y toda la vida ha realizado esta actividad y es su única fuente de ingreso, gracias a Dios le va bien ya que sabe cómo manejar sus productos, El desea comprar antes de la cosecha todo los insumos necesarios y es por eso que solicita a INTEGRAL un préstamo para la compra de semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, pesticidas entre otros, ya que cuenta con buenas excelencias de pago, esta seguro que las bendiciones se le darán y el seguirá dándole una buena condición de vida para su familia.
texts.en:
Mario is fifty-four years old and lives with his wife and children.  He is a man who is very committed to his work and to his home responsibilities; everyone knows him for being a very responsible, honest, and sincere person.  

Mario makes a living in the cultivation of basic grains, like corn and beans.  He has been doing this for his whole life, and this is his only means of income.  Thanks to God, everything is going well since he already knows how to manage his products.  

He hopes to buy all the necessary supplies before the harvest, and it is for this reason that he is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL.  He will buy seeds, manure, fertilizer, pesticide, and other items.  

Since he has good means of payment, he is sure that blessings will come to him and that he will be able to continue giving his family a good way of life.

loans.use: to buy seeds, manure, fertilizer, pesticide, and other items.

loans.name: Jose Misael

texts.es: Jose de 29 años de edad habita junto a su esposa y sus hijos en casa propia. Es un hombre con diversas capacidades y cualidades que los vecinos, siempre con la disposición de ayudar a quien lo necesita Jose  es muy amable, con los que lo buscan, responsable con sus actividades y méritos diarios. Actualmente se dedica a la labor de ser agricultor, es decir cultiva Granos basicos como maiz y frijol y ademas con esfuerzo poseen una pequeña tienda que es admeinistrada por su esposa. Gracias a su manera de ser posee de clientes quienes lo buscan por precios accesibles y en esta ocasión necesita que INTEGRAL le brinde un préstamo para la compra de insumos agrícolas, y a la preparacion del terreno ya que los que tenia se le terminaron y para esta próxima cosecha necesita comprar: semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, pesticidas entre otros. Espera contar con la ayuda puesto que no tiene otros recursos para seguir alimentando a su familia
texts.en:
29-year old Jose lives with his wife and children in his own home. He is a man with a variety of skills and qualities who is always ready to help his neighbours. He is very friendly to those whom he helps, and responsible in his work and daily activities. 

Currently Jose is working as a farmer growing basic grains such as corn and beans. As well he has a small store which his wife runs. Because of the type of person he is, he has customers who seek him out for his fair prices. Now he needs a loan from INTEGRAL to buy agricultural supplies for his land. He has finished those he had so in time for the next season, he needs to buy: seeds, manure, fertilizer, pesticide etc. 

Jose hopes to obtain this loan as he has no other way of feeding his family.

loans.use: buy seeds, manure, fertilizer, pesticide etc. for his land

loans.name: Vilma Antonia

texts.es: Vilma de 55 años de edad habita juntos a su esposo y sus hijos, muy conocida por sus vecinos como una mujer trabajadora, emprendedora, capaz de realizar todo aquello que se ponga en mente. Ella se dedica al  cultivo de granos basicos  maiz y frijoles, maíz.  así como ella comercializa todo lo que Dios le provee. Vilma desea en estas próximas cosechas tener más ganancias pues ya que no cuenta con otros ingresos desea tener lo necesario para que en su hogar nunca falte el pan de cada día. Es pos eso que solicita a INTEGRAL un préstamo para comprar insumos agrícolas como: fertilizantes, pesticidas, herbicidas, semillas y abonos. Espera contar con la ayuda y de ante mano agradece a Dios por darle esta oportunidad de superación de vida.
texts.en:
Vilma, 55, lives with her husband and children. The neighbors say she is hardworking, enterprising, and able to accomplish whatever she sets her mind to. Vilma grows basic crops such as corn and beans and is able to sell everything she produces.

Vilma hopes to earn more with the next harvests, since they are her only income source and she wants to make sure her family is provided for. She is applying to INTEGRAL for a loan to buy agricultural supplies such as fertilizer, pesticide, weed killer, seed, and manure. She is counting on this help and thanks God for the chance to get ahead in life.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies such as fertilizer, pesticide, weed killer, seed, and manure.

loans.name: Astenia Noemy

texts.es: Astenia de 33 años de edad, vive junto a su grupo familiar. Reside en casa propia gracias a Dios, siempre con el deseo de superación se caracteriza por ser emprendedora con sus que haceres domésticos y a la vez ayudarle a su esposo en su trabajo. Astenia al igual que su esposo se dedica a ser agricultor y alquila una pequeña parcela donde cultiva los granos básicos de la zona como lo son maíz y frijol y a su vez cultiva loroco.  La cliente desea en estas próximas cosechas tener más ganancias es por esa razón que solicita  INTEGRAL un préstamo el cual le permita comprar insumos agrícolas como: semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, herbicidas entre otros; Y a su vez pagar el alquiler de la parcela ya que no cuenta con otros  ingresos y esto es lo único que sabe realizar. Espera que la ayuda solicitada llegue así en su hogar no faltara el pan de cada día.
texts.en: Astenia, 33, lives with her family.  She owns the house where she lives and is known to be hard-working.  She takes care of the family home and also helps her husband with his work.  Astenia and her husband are farmers.  They rent a small plot where they grow grains--maize, beans and locoro--common to this area.  Astenia is applying for an INTEGRAL loan, part of which she will use to buy supplies--seeds, manure, fertilizer, herbicides, etc.-- for the business and the rest to pay the rent on the plot of land that they farm.  Farming is all Astenia knows how to do and she hopes the investment will increase the size of her crop and, in turn, her income. Her family has no other source of income and she needs the loan to make sure they can continue to provide for themselves.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, etc. for her farming business.

loans.name: Jose Alberto

texts.es: Jose de 49 años de edad, es un hombre muy responsable con sus obligaciones de hogar, ya que siempre se ha caracterizado por brindarles lo mejor a su familia. Actualmente vive junto a su esposa y sus hijos es muy trabajador, siempre lo ha realizado con alegría y entusiasmo, se dedica a ser agricultora siembra todos loa años los principales granos básicos de la zona como lo son, maíz y frijol. José desea incrementar sus ventas y por eso visitó las oficinas de INTEGRAL para solicitar un crédito el cual le permita comprar: semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, pesticidas entre otros. Desea contar con la ayuda solicitada puesto que no tiene otros ingresos monetarios, y así el seguirá llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar sin limitación alguna.
texts.en: Jose, 49, is known to be a responsible man who has always taken care of his family.  He lives with his wife and children.  He operates a farming business, work that he has long carried out with enthusiasm and good humor.  He has, for many years, grown the basic grains--maize and beans--that are most common to this area.  Jose wants to increase his sales and he is applying for an INTEGRAL loan that he will use to buy the supplies he needs--seeds, manure, fertilizer, pesticides, etc.--to grow his business.  He has no other source of income and is counting on the loan so that he can continue farming and providing for his family.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, etc. for his farming business.

loans.name: Guliver

texts.en: Guliver is 60-years-old man. He is married and lives with his large family in the Chkhorotsku district.  He has wife, son, daughter-in-law and two grandchildren. Each member of the family gets monthly IDP assistance from the government institutions as they are persecuted. Guliver has requested loans from local financial institutions several times for family business start-up, but without any success. His loan requests were rejected all the time, because of low income and the family’s poor living conditions. The family has 2 hectares of agricultural land, where 1200 nut trees are grown. They sell the harvested nuts locally. According to Credo estimations, the family belongs to the subsistence poor category. His loan request was approved in the frames of new joint initiative of Kiva and Credo. The start-up loan program envisages provision of business start-up and re-startup credits with soft conditions to country rural poor, which do not have access to credit products, being regarded as “high risk borrowers” because of low income. With the requested loan, Guliver wants to open a Georgian bread bakery. He owns a commercial space and will buy all the needed equipment. Guliver will bake the Georgian bread himself.  Guliver hopes the business will be profitable, as the location is very populous. The new business initiative, financed with the Kiva Start-up loan will significantly improve the living conditions of his family and Guliver will be able to provide for his children’s education in the future.

loans.use: to open a Georgian bread bakery

loans.name: Mwanamisi

texts.en:
Mwanamisi is a 34-years-old person, married with two children. She lives together with her husband in Samburu, Kenya where they stay in their own building with electric power and tap water. She has a retail shop.
She has approached for a loan amountinfg to KES 25000 to buy sacks of maize flour, bundles of wheat flour and cooking oil. She is grateful for the help.

loans.use: to buy sacks of maize flour, bundles of wheat flour and cooking oil

loans.name: Lucy

texts.en: Lucy is 48 years old and supports four members of her family. She has been selling clothes for about 11 years, with an income of approximately 31,200 KES a month. This is her fourth loan with KADET LTD after successfully repaying the previous ones. She wants to use the loan to buy more new clothes for sale. She hopes to be a leading boutique owner.

loans.use: to buy more new clothes for sale.

loans.name: Macaria

texts.en: Macaria is 47 years old, married and has six children. To gain income, she sells beauty products to the people in her village. She has been in her business for over five years now and earns about P5,000 each month selling these items. She would like to increase sales, and that is why she is asking for a loan of P13,000 to buy cosmetics, perfumes and soap to sell. This will help increase sales and profits as well. Additional revenue will be used for education expenses.

loans.use: to buy vitamins, cosmetics, perfumes and soap to sell

loans.name: Fouad

texts.en:
Fouad is from Iraq. He is 35 years old and single. Fouad lives with his parents and he is the only provider of the family. Fouad owns a small grocery store selling soft drinks, juices, cheese, dairy products, detergents and snacks. He established his business in 2012, and now he has an employee. He built a good experience in this field and he is well known in the surrounding area, with an excellent reputation.

Fouad is requesting a sum of $1,200 to buy a motor generator and to increase his inventory. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits so he will be able to provide himself better life conditions.

loans.use: to buy a motor generator and to increase his inventory

loans.name: Raed

texts.en:
Raed is from Iraq. He is 32 years old, married, and has five children. Raed is the only provider of the family.

Raed owns a small grocery store, where he sells soft drinks, juices, cheese, dairy products, detergents, and snacks. He established his business in 2008. He built good experience in this field and he is well-known in the surrounding area, with an excellent reputation.

Raed is requesting a USD 1,500 loan to install a modern display window in his shop. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits, so he will be able to provide his children with better life conditions.

loans.use: to install a modern display window in his shop.

loans.name: Raed

texts.en:
Raed is a 29-year-old single youth client from Iraq. He lives with four family members, one of whom is employed. Raed works as a barber and he established his own business in 2008 after working for over three years to gain experience. He has one employee and has built an excellent reputation in his surrounding area.

Raed is requesting a 1,800 USD youth loan to install a second ceiling and purchase some equipment. In the future, he hopes to expand his business and increase his profits to have a good future.

loans.use: to install a second ceiling and purchase equipment

loans.name: Yahya

texts.en:
Yahya is a 27-year-old youth client from Iraq. He is married with three children and is the sole provider for his family. Yahya owns a small grocery store where he sells soft drinks, juices, cheese, dairy products, detergent, and snacks. He established his business in 2006 and has an employee. Yahya has gained good experience in this field and he is well-known in the surrounding area and has an excellent reputation.

Yahya is requesting an 1,800 USD youth loan to renovate his grocery store. In the future, he hopes to grow his business and increase his profits to provide his children with a good education.

loans.use: to renovate his grocery store

loans.name: Daniel

texts.en:
Daniel is 38 years old, married to Deborah, and they are blessed with three children. Daniel is a carpenter. He has been in this business for the last five years and gets an income of KES 20,000 per month.

Daniel has got a good credit history with Kenya Agency for Development of Enterprise and Technology (KADET) and he is applying for his second loan of KES 40,000 from KADET which he plans to use to buy raw materials, like timber. 

He will use the extra profit to expand his business and to educate his children. He hopes to further expand his business.

loans.use: to buy more raw materials for his business, like timber.

loans.name: Juan Jose

texts.es: El sr. Juan de 45 años de edad, su esposa es ama de casa, tiene 3 hijos que dependen de el. El trabaja como policía municipal para la alcaldía desde hace 1 año como fijo y tenia 4 años de trabajar como contratado. El cliente es el sustento de su hogar ya que en su casa es el único que trabaja, sus hijos estudian y su esposa es quien se encarga de las tareas de la casa.  Solicita este nuevo crédito para la construcción de un muro ya que su casa queda en una loma y necesita construir este muro para evitar que la construcción se vea en riesgo de deteriorarse.
texts.en: Juan, 45, has three dependent children; his wife’s a housewife.  He’s been working as a permanent municipal police officer for the city for a year but had already worked for four years as a contracted employee.  He has supported his home since he’s the only one that works; his children are in school and his wife takes care of the household chores.  He’s asking for this new loan to build a wall because his house is on a hillside and he needs to build this wall to keep the house safe from damage.

loans.use: to buy building supplies like concrete blocks, cement, sand, rebar and gravel.

loans.name: Yaovi

texts.fr: Mariée à une couturière et âgé de 38ans, mr Yaovi est père 02 enfants tous à l'école âgés de 06 et 04ans. Il a appris la menuiserie et fabrique des chaises, des lits et des armoires qu’il vend à toutes personne. Son activité se fait dans un atelier et il fait un premier crédit à WAGES pour acheter du bois. Comme perspectives d’avenir, il voudrait ouvrir d’autres ateliers et créer un centre de formation. Avec les profits, il espère assurer les besoins élémentaires de la famille.
texts.en: Mr Yaovi is 38 years old, married to a seamstress and the father of two children aged 6 and 4 years, both of whom attend school. He learned how to be a carpetner and makes chairs, bed frames and dressers whom he sells to a number of customers. This activity is conducted in a workshop. He is asking for his first loan from WAGES in order to purchase wood. He hopes to someday open other workshops and establish a training center. He will use the profits to ensure the needs of his family.

loans.use: purchase wood

loans.name: Mwaka

texts.en:
Mwaka is 29 years old and married with two children. She lives with her family in Samburu, Kenya. Mwaka is a hardworking entrepreneur who operates a general store. 

Mwaka is requesting a 20,000 KES loan to buy shampoo, detergent, and sacks of sugar. She is grateful for this opportunity.

loans.use: to buy shampoo, detergent, and sacks of sugar

loans.name: Ahsan

texts.en:
Ahsan is a 23-year-old single youth client. He lives in Iraq and has two brothers. Ahsan and one of his parents provide the income for his family. Since 2012, he has owned a small shop where he sells handbags. Ahsan has a good reputation in the surrounding area and has one employee.

Ahsan is requesting a 2,400 USD youth loan to pay the annual rent for his shop. In the future, he hopes to expand his business and increase his profits. His goal is to open a bigger shop one day with more accessories to sell.

loans.use: to pay the annual rent of his shop

loans.name: Jose

texts.es: Jose de 51 años de edad vive junto  a su familia su esposa y sus hijos. Es un hombre visionario que siempre se ha caracterizado por ser un padre y esposo ejemplar  que sus deseos de superación siempre han sido altos, siendo responsable, honesto, humilde, trabajador y muy emprendedor. Se dedica al cultivo de la granos basicos siendo mas especificos maiz y frijol, Y tambien vende muebles elaborados de Bambu pero su profesion es ser agricultor. Desde hace varios años se ha dedicado a esta actividad y lo hace con esfuerzo y dedicación. Jose  desea comprar insumos para seguir comercializando sus productos y que no se le arruinen por no tener lo necesario para cultivarlos es por eso que ha tomado la iniciativa de acercarse a INTEGRAL  para solicitar un crédito y comprar insumos como: Abonos, Fertilizantes, Pesticidas u otros. Espera que la ayuda que solicita se le sea dada ya que cuenta con buenas referencias de pagos y espera saldar la deuda antes de lo previsto.
texts.en:
José, 51, lives with his family, his wife and his children.  He’s a forward thinking man who has always been noted for being an exemplary father and husband.  His drive for self-improvement has always been strong; he’s responsible, honest, humble, hardworking and very enterprising.

He works growing basic grains, specifically corn and beans.  He also sells furniture made from bamboo but his profession is being a farmer.  He’s worked in this occupation for several years and he does so with much effort and dedication.

José wants to buy supplies to continue selling his products and to keep them from becoming damaged for lack of what’s needed to grow them.  This is why he’s taken the initiative of approaching INTEGRAL to request a loan to buy supplies like manure, fertilizer, pesticide and others.  He hopes he’ll be granted the support requested because he has good payment references and he expects to repay the loan ahead of time.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies.

loans.name: Luis Miguel

texts.es: El joven Luis de 24 años de edad es casado, su esposa es ama de casa, tiene 3 hijos que dependen de el. El cliente trabaja desde  hace 1 año  para la alcaldía como policía municipal. Tanto su esposa como sus hijos dependen de el ya que solo el trabaja. Solicita este nuevo crédito para la construcción de una cocina y baño que le  permitirá tener mas espacio en su casa ya que actualmente es la sala que le sirve de cocina. Con el crédito anterior logro construir un porche.
texts.en:
The young, 24-year old Luis is married.  His wife is a homemaker, and he has 3 dependent children.  

The client has been working for a year for the town hall as a municipal policeman.  His wife as well as his children depend on him, as he is the only one who works.

He is applying for this new loan to build a kitchen and bathroom that will allow him to have more space in his house, because they are currently using the living room as a kitchen.  With the previous loan, he was able to build a porch.

loans.use: to buy cinder blocks, cement, iron and sand.

loans.name: Jose Ramon

texts.es: El joven Jose Cruz de 29 años de edad es soltero, no tiene hijos, las personas que dependen de el son su mama y hermana. El trabaja para la Alcaldia como operario de limpieza desde hace 1 año. Solicita este  credito para la compra de materiales como zinc para poder hacer un cambio de techo en su casa de habitacion ya que el que tiene actualmente esta en muy malas condicones y se pasa el agua cuando llueve y afecta la calidad de vida de el y su familia ya que su mama es una señora de edad.
texts.en: Jose Cruz is 29 years old. He is single and doesn't have any children. The people he supports are his mother and his sister.  He has been working for City Hall as a janitor for one year. He is requesting this loan to purchase materials like zinc in order to replace the roof in the house where he lives, because the one they have now is in very bad condition and water leaks through when it rains. This impacts his and his family's quality of life, since his mother is an older lady.

loans.use: to buy sheets of zinc, purlin beams, and pay for labor.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: purchase general food products and rechargeable mobile phone cards

loans.name: Ghassan

texts.en:
Ghassan is a 57-year-old married man who is the father of two children. He has been working in the food business since he was 14 years old and his extensive experience has provided him with customer trust and support. Ghassan is a hard worker who makes sure that his store has everything his customers might ask for. He knows everyone's needs, and puts forth so much so much effort to please them.
 
Ghassan is applying for his sixth loan from the Kiva partner Al Majmoua to purchase store merchandise to provide special offers and support his business. His previous loans were invested for the same purpose and have helped him to improve his living standards and develop his business. Ghassan's loan is especially important to manage special spring and summer needs and requests.

loans.use: to purchase store merchandise to provide special offers

loans.name: Sabiha

texts.en:
Sabiha is 61 years old and a widow with three children. She lives in Iraq and is the only provider for her family. Sabiha opened a grocery store in 2002 and she sells soft drinks, juices, cheese, dairy products, detergent, and snacks. She built good experience in her field and is well-known in surrounding areas and has an excellent reputation.

Sabiha is requesting an 1,800 USD loan to buy a generator and to increase her food supply inventory. In the future she hopes to expand her business and increase her profits so that she may be better able to provide for her children.

loans.use: to buy a generator, food, and supplies

loans.name: Hussain

texts.en:
Hussain is a 26-year-old youth client from Iraq. He is married and has one child. Hussain is the only provider for his family. Since 2009, he has owned a small grocery store where he sells soft drinks, juices, cheese, dairy products, detergent, and snacks. Hussain has good experience and is well-known in surrounding areas with an excellent reputation.

Hussain is requesting an 1,800 USD youth loan to install a new rolling shutter for his grocery store. In the future, he hopes to expand his business and increase his profits so he will be able to provide his family with better living conditions.

loans.use: to install a rolling shutter for his grocery store

loans.name: Johel Antonio

texts.es: Johel de 38 años de edad y habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su familia. Johel se dedica al cultivo de hortalizas, siendo esta  su principal fuente de ingresos, Ha realizado esta actividad por mucho tiempo y es así como se gana la vida honradamente. Él es un hombre muy responsable, honesto y dedicado en su trabajo. Es muy conocido por sus vecinos los cuales dan buenas referencias de su trabajo como de su persona. Cada año repite está actividad ya que es una persona muy humilde y de escasos recursos el cual no puede tener   otro tipo de negocio o trabajo. Este año al igual que los anteriores ha decidido cultivar la tierra y ya que la temporada de siembra está cerca él quiere estar preparado con los  insumos agrícolas necesarios  para cosechar los principales granos básicos. Esta es la razón por la cual solicita este crédito a esta institución, INTEGRAL, ya que no cuenta con los recursos económicos necesarios  para realizar la inversión. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de insumos agrícolas como: semillas, abonos, insecticidas,  etc. De esta forma espera lograr cultivar los principales granos básicos de este año para poder llevar el pan de cada día a su familia.
texts.en:
Johel, 38, lives with his family in a house that they own. Johel grows vegetables as his main source of income. He has been doing this for a long time, which is how he earns an honest living. 

He is a very responsible man, honest and dedicated to his work. He is well known among his neighbors who give good references to his work as much his character. He repeats this activity every year as he is a very humble and poor person with scarce resources so he can do no other type of business or work. 

This year, as with years before, he has decided to farm, and since planting season is close he wants to be prepared with the necessary agricultural supplies to harvest basic grains. He is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL because he does not have the financial resources to make the investment. The loan will be invested in the purchase of agricultural supplies such as seed, fertilizer, insecticide, etc. In this way, he hopes to cultivate the basic grains this year so he can bring home the daily bread for his family.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies such as seed, fertilizer, insecticide, etc.

loans.name: Francisco Jose

texts.es: El sr. Francisco de 54 años de edad es casado, su esposa es ama de casa, las personas que dependen de el son su esposa y sus padres quienes ya son unos ancianos y es su esposa quien se encarga del cuido de ellos. Solicita este credito para la compra de materiales como zinc y ampliar su casa que es toda construida de laminas de zinc, tambien comprara materiales como piedras canteras ya que su sueño es tener construida su casa de concreto para en un hogar seguro y digno con su familia.
texts.en: Francisco is 54 years old and married. His wife is a homemaker, and he supports her and his parents, who are seniors. His wife takes care of them. He is requesting this loan to purchase materials like zinc in order to build an addition to his house, which is made entirely out of sheets of zinc. He will also buy other materials, like quarry stone, because his dream is to have his house built with concrete so that he and his family can live in a safe and decent home.

loans.use: to buy sheets of zinc and quarry stone.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to increase his stock of food supplies.

loans.name: Nugzar

texts.en:
Nugzar is 35 years old and is married with two children, both of whom attend school. He lives in the suburb of Tbilisi city with his wife and family. Nugzar works as an artisan on construction projects for private contracts and his family also has a small plot of land that they cultivate. This business is looked after by Nugzar's wife who sells the harvest locally for a small monthly income. Nugzar has requested loans from local financial institutions several times to start up a family business, but his loan requests were rejected all the time because of his low income and the family’s poor living conditions. According to Credo estimates, the family belongs to the subsistence poor category. 

Nugzar is requesting a loan from Credo to start up a greenhouse business and purchase iron pillars and polyethylene coverings to build a greenhouse and cultivate vegetables to sell in Tbilisi markets. His loan request was approved under the framework of a new joint initiative of Kiva and Credo that envisages the provision of business start-up and re-startup credits with soft conditions to the rural poor who do not have access to credit products as they are regarded as “high risk borrowers” due to low income. His new business, financed with his Kiva start-up loan, will give Nugzar's family the chance to improve their living conditions.

loans.use: purchase iron pillars and polyethylene coverings to build a greenhouse

loans.name: Naomi

texts.en: Naomi is a thirty-year-old lady, married to Elisavan and the mother of four lovely children. She operates a grocery store in Kawangware. She has been in this business for four years and earns a monthly income of 60,000 Kenyan shillings (KES 60,000). This will be Naomi's first loan from KADET LTD. She plans to use the entire loan to buy groceries, such as potatoes, cabbages and tomatoes, to sell. In the future, she wants to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy groceries, such as potatoes, cabbages and tomatoes, to sell in her store.

loans.name: Nouha

texts.en:
Nouha is a 41-year-old married woman and the mother of four children. She has been working in selling clothes since five years ago. 

Nouha is a hard worker. She puts so much effort into improving her business as much as she can to make sure that her customers are pleased and satisfied. 

She is applying for her second loan cycle from Kiva partner Al Majmoua in order to increase her merchandise with special spring and summer collections.

In addition to clothes selling, Nouha is starting to sell accessories to diversify her products.

Nouha’s previous loan supported her family a lot, through providing them with the necessary things they need.

She hopes that she can expand her business more and more in the future to make sure that her customers will be satisfied and her family will live a normal living where they can get anything they need.

loans.use: to increase her merchandise with special spring and summer collections.

loans.name: Alejandro Eugenio

texts.es: Alejandro de 41 años de edad, vive junto a su familia su esposa y sus hijos, en casa propia. Es muy conocido por sus vecinos por ser muy responsable, honesto y sincero en su hogar, ya que siempre se ha caracterizado por ser un buen padre y esposo ejemplar y gracias a Dios jamás le ha quedado mal a nadie. Alejandro se ha dedicado toda su vida hacer agricultor y comercializa todo lo que cosecha gracias Dios posee buenos clientes que siempre se han destacado porque le ayudan en la compra de sus productos. Pero en estas últimas cosechas no ha tenido buenas ganancias es por eso que solicita a INTEGRAL un préstamo para la compra de insumos agrícolas como: semillas, herbicidas, fertilizantes entre otros. Gracias a Dios confía en que su vida mejorara y seguirá llevando el sustento diario a su casa
texts.en:
Alejandro is a 41-year old man who lives with his wife and children in their family house. He's very well regarded among his neighbors as a very responsible, honest and sincere person, as he's always been a good father and a model husband and, thank goodness, he's never let anyone down.

For his whole life, Alejandro has worked in agriculture and sold everything he cultivates. Thank goodness he has good clients that have always stood out for buying his products. However, he hasn't had good earnings in the last few harvests, which is why he's requesting a loan to INTEGRAL to buy farming supplies, such as seeds, weed-killer and fertilizer, among others. He's confident his life will improve and that he'll be able to provide daily for his family.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies, such as seeds, weed-killer and fertilizer, among others.

loans.name: Dagoberto

texts.es: Dagoberto habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su esposa e hijo. Él se dedica  al cultivo de los principales granos básicos y a la crianza de ganado desde hace muchos años,  las cuales realiza año con año para llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar. Estas actividades son las que le permiten  cubrir las necesidades básicas de su hogar y Do las ragoberto realiza con gran empeño y dedicación. Él es un hombre trabajador,  honrado y responsable vive en condiciones muy humildes junto a su familia y esta es la razón que le motiva a trabajar duramente para dar lo mejor a su familia ya que es la única forma  de poder cambiar la realidad en la que se encuentran. Dagoberto sabe que con un poco de ayuda para invertir en sus cultivos y en la crianza de su ganado podrá generar más ingresos los cuales le ayudaran a cambiar el futuro de su familia, es por estas razones que se acercó a INTEGRAL, para solicitar un crédito el cual solicita para invertir en la compra de ganado y de insumos para sus cosechas como pesticidas, abono, semillas, etc. ya que son sus dos únicas fuentes de ingresos y espera que estas cosechas sean mejores que los años anteriores para tener buenos ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Dagoberto lives in his own house with his wife and child.  He has earned a living for many years growing the main basic grains and raising livestock, which he does year in and year out to put food on the table in his household.

These jobs are what allow him to cover the basic household needs, and Dagoberto carries them out with great effort and dedication.  He's a hardworking, honorable, and responsible man.  He lives in humble conditions with his family, who motivate him to work hard to give them the best.  This is the only way of being able to change the reality in which they live.

Dagoberto knows that with a little help to invest in his crops and in raising his livestock he'll be able to generate more income, which will help him change his family's future.  This is why he went to Integral to request a loan to invest in buying livestock and supplies for his crops, such as pesticide, fertilizer, seed, etc.

These are his only two sources of income and he hopes these harvests will be better than in previous years so he has good income for his family.

loans.use: to buy livestock and agricultural supplies

loans.name: Santos Matias

texts.es: El sr. Santos de 41 años de edad es casado, su esposa trabaja como costurera ademas que ellos tienen un pequeño taller de ebanisteria en su casa de donde obtienen ingresos extras para la manutencion del hogar. El cliente trabaja para la alcaldia como policia municipal desde hace 11 años. Solicita este nuevo credito para culminar la construccion de su vivienda y realizar la compra de madera, zinc y otros materiales, en sus planes esta la remodelacion de un baño que esta en pesimas condiciones, culminacion y repello de paredes que le serviran como divisiones de sala.
texts.en: Santos is 41 years old and married. His wife works as a seamstress and they also have a small cabinetmaking shop at home, where they make extra income to maintain their household. This client has been working for City Hall as a city police officer for eleven years. He is requesting a new loan to finish building his house and purchase wood, zinc, and other materials. His plans include remodeling a bathroom that is in terrible condition, and finishing and plastering the walls that will work as room dividers.

loans.use: to buy sheets of zinc, wood, nails, and beams.

loans.name: Shota

texts.en:
Shota is 33 years old and is married. He lives with his wife in the small village of Telavi District. Shota works as an agricultural worker in the village and he has a wood-cutting machine that he uses to harvest wood. He brings timber from the forest using his own horse and sells it in the community. Shota's business barely provides enough food for the family. He has requested loans from local financial institutions several times to start up a family business, but his loan requests were rejected all the time because of his low income and the family’s poor living conditions. According to Credo estimates, the family belongs to the subsistence poor category. 

Shota is requesting a from Credo to start up a business and purchase calves to raise and sell. His loan request was approved under the framework of a new joint initiative of Kiva and Credo that envisages the provision of business start-up and re-startup credits with soft conditions to the rural poor who do not have access to credit products as they are regarded as “high risk borrowers” due to low income. His new business, financed with his Kiva start-up loan, will give Shota's family the chance to significantly improve their living conditions.

loans.use: purchase calves to raise and sell

loans.name: Hussein

texts.en: Hussein is from Iraq. He is 41 years old, married, and has two children. Hussein and his wife provide the income of the family. Hussein is a car mechanic. After working for over ten years in this field, he established his own business in 2009, and now he has one employee. He has built up good experience in this field, and he is well known in the surrounding area and has an excellent reputation. Hussein is applying for a loan of $2,400 to pay the yearly rent on his shop and to increase his inventory. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits, so he will be able to provide his family with better living conditions.

loans.use: to pay the yearly rent on his auto repair shop and to increase his inventory.

loans.name: Fatuma

texts.en: Fatuma is 33 years old. She is married and has two children, both in school. She lives with her children and husband in Samburu, Kenya. She owns a charcoal store--a business she had been engaged in for the past two years. Her major monthly expenditure is to pay school fees. She has applied for a loan of KES 30,000 to buy sacks of charcoal for resale. She is grateful for the help.

loans.use: to buy sacks of charcoal to sell in her store.

loans.name: Khadir

texts.en: Khadir is from Iraq. He is 48 years old, married, and has three children. Khadir and two of his children provide the family income. Khadir is a mechanic. He established his business in 2000, and now he has one employee. He built up good experience in this field, and he is well known in the surrounding area and has an excellent reputation. Khadir is applying for a loan of $2,400 to install an external ceiling and a rolling shutter at his shop, as well as to buy some specialized equipment for his work. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits, so he will be able to provide his children with a good future.

loans.use: to install an external ceiling and a rolling shutter for his shop, as well as to buy some specialized equipment for his work

loans.name: Mary

texts.en: Mary, from Naivasha, is 40 years old, and she is married to Mwangi. They have three children, who are in school. Mary has operated a timber business for the past four years. She has applied for her first loan from KADET LTD. She intends to use the loan to purchase a larger stock of timber for sale. She hopes to expand her business and improve her standard of living in the near future.

loans.use: to buy a larger stock of timber to sell in her business.

loans.name: Yonis Eduardo

texts.es: Yonis de 22 años de edad, habita junto a su familia conformada por ser 6 personas, pero el nada mas trabaja para darle una mejor condicion de vida a su esposa. Es un hombre trabajador, honesto y decidido a seguirle brindando un buen futuro a su familia.  Con sus buenos modales y forma de tratar a la gente es responsable con sus obligaciones de hogar y todo lo hace con alegria y entusiamos. Actualmente Yonis se dedica  al cultivo de granos básicos es así como honradamente se gana la vida, y hace que su familia posea grandes admiraciones porque se caracterizan por ser trabajadores y visionarios. El cliente desea comprar insumos agrícolas para sus cultivos ya que se vienen épocas de cosechas y desea tener lo necesario es por eso que solicita a INTEGRAL un préstamo para la compra de Semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, pesticidas entre otros. Espera tener la ayuda solicitada para tener las mejores cosechas y venderlos como siempre lo ha hecho y que en su hogar no falte el pan de cada día.
texts.en:
Yonis, 22, lives with his family comprising six people but he works just to provide his wife with a better quality of life.  He’s a hardworking, honest man determined to continue providing a good future for his family.  He’s well-mannered and treats people well and he’s responsible with his home obligations; he does everything joyfully and enthusiastically.

Currently, Yonis works growing basic grains; this is the way he earns his livelihood honorably and sees to his family being highly regarded because they are noted for being hardworking and visionary.

He wants to buy farm supplies for his crops because harvest time is nearing and he wants to have everything necessary.  This is why he’s asking INTEGRAL for a loan to buy seeds, manure, fertilizer and pesticide among others.  He hopes to get the requested support in order to get the best harvests to sell them like he’s always done so that his home will not lack daily bread.

loans.use: to buy seeds, manure, fertilizer, pesticide, etc.

loans.name: German Antonio

texts.es: El sr. German de 42 años de edad es acompañado , su señora es ama de casa y tiene 3 hijos que dependen de el. El cliente trabaja para la alcaldia como operario de limpieza desde hace 14 años. Solicita un nuevo credito para la compra de materiales de cosntruccion como piedras cantera, cemento, hierro etc e ir comprando todo lo necesario para construir su casa de concreto ya que en la actualidad es de madera y zinc, este credito les ayudara a ir realizando su sueño de tener una casa segura y bonita para el y toda su familia.
texts.en: German is 42 years old and lives with his partner, who is a homemaker. He supports three children. This client has been working for City Hall as a sanitation worker for fourteen years. He is requesting a new loan to purchase construction material like quarry stone, cement, iron, etc. He wants to gradually buy everything he needs in order to build his house with concrete, because currently it is made of wood and zinc. This loan will allow them to realize their dream of having a safe and beautiful home for the whole family.

loans.use: to buy quarry stone, cement, iron, etc.

loans.name: Maria Paz

texts.en:
Maria Paz is 37 years old and married with three children.

Maria Paz works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to buy items  like shampoo, oil, sugar and other groceries to sell in her general store.

Maria Paz has borrowed and paid four loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for four years and also earns an income from hog raising.

Maria Paz aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items like shampoo, oil, sugar and other groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Hamed

texts.en:
Hamed is 46 years old and married with six children. He lives in Iraq and three of his children are employed. Hamed is a mechanic and he owns a small garage. He established his business in 1995 and now has one employee. Hamed has built good experience in his field and is well-known in the surrounding areas as having an excellent reputation.

Hamed is requesting a 2,100 USD loan to install signage and a rolling shutter as well as to buy a generator for his garage. In the future, he hopes to expand his business and increase his profits to better provide for his family.

loans.use: to install signage and buy a rolling shutter and a generator for his garage

loans.name: Eduarda

texts.en:
Eduarda is married. She has a kiosk to generate income for her family. Her husband is a driver. She has been thinking how to run a big business.

Eduarda is applying for a loan of $1,000 to buy additional supplies to keep in her kiosk such as Coca-cola, Fanta, Sprite, noodles, bread, cigarettes, and eggs. 

Eduarda opened her kiosk one year ago with her own capital of $200.

loans.use: to buy Coca-cola, Fanta, Sprite, noodles, and bread.

loans.name: María Gumercinda

texts.es: Maria habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su grupo familiar su esposo y sus hijos. Ella se dedica  a la agricultura de granos básicos como maíz, frijol. Esta actividad la realiza  junto a su esposo y es así como logran llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar.  Maria es una mujer emprendedora, trabajadora  y responsable.  Siempre se ha  dedicado a la agricultura por lo que  conoce muy bien la manera de hacer esta activada. Cada año realiza esta actividad de la cual vende una parte de su cosecha y la otra la deja para consumo. Es así como poco a poco va saliendo adelante y dando a su familia el alimento básico. Vive en condiciones muy humildes junto con su familia, esto la hace agarrar más fuerzas para seguir luchando por un futuro diferente. Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en los insumos agrícolas como: semillas, abonos, insecticidas, etc. Es así como  se gana la vida y lleva el pan de cada día a su hogar. Espera que  este año la cosecha sea favorable y logre cumplir su sueño.
texts.en:
María lives in a house that’s her property with her family group: her husband and children.  She works in agriculture growing basic grains like corn and beans.  She does this work with her husband and this is how they manage to provide daily bread for their home.  

María is an enterprising, hardworking and very responsible woman.  She’s always worked in agriculture so knows very well how to do this work.  She does this work every year and sells part of her harvest and uses the remaining part for home consumption.  This is how she’s gradually been getting ahead and providing basic nutrition for her family.

She lives with her family under very humble conditions which leads her to find the strength to continue striving towards a different future.  She’s decided to ask INTEGRAL for a loan to buy farm supplies like seeds, manure, insecticide, etc.  This is how she earns her living and provides daily bread for her home.  She hopes this year’s harvest will be favorable and to reach her dream.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies like seeds, manure, insecticide, etc.

loans.name: Valentina

texts.ru:
Валентина замужем. У нее есть взрослый сын. Валентина продает кондитерские изделия на рынке на протяжении 15 лет. Она добрый и отзывчивый человек в жизни и внимательная с клиентами на работе.

Валентина просит предоставить ей кредит в сумме 17000 гривен. Она хочет сделать ремонт в ванной и заменить  окна в доме. На данный момент ванной комнаты нет в доме. Валентина хочет улучшить жилищные условия благодаря кредиту.
texts.en:
